h4.p: [03]^b^1^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dukanipātassa ^a^M2.0001^ea^^a^V2.0001^ea^ paṭhame ^b^pahārasādhanattha^eb^nti daṇḍappahārassa sukhasiddhi-atthaṃ. Kañjito nibbattaṃ kañjiyaṃ, āranālaṃ, yaṃ bilaṅgantipi vuccati, taṃ yattha siñcati, sā kañjiyaukkhalikā bilaṅgathālikā, taṃsadisaṃ kāraṇaṃ ^b^bilaṅgathālikaṃ. Sīsakaṭāhaṃ uppāṭetvā^eb^ti ayoguḷappavesappamāṇaṃ chiddaṃ katvā. ^b^Saṅkhamuṇḍakammakāraṇa^eb^nti saṅkhaṃ viya muṇḍakaraṇaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Rāhumukhakammakāraṇa^eb^nti rāhumukhagatasūriyasadisakammakāraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Jotimālika^eb^nti ^a^V2.0002^ea^ jotimālavantaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Hatthapajjotika^eb^nti hatthassa pajjotanakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Erakavattakammakāraṇa^eb^nti erakavattasadise sarīrato cammavatte uppāṭanakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Cīrakavāsikakammakāraṇa^eb^nti sarīrato uppāṭitavattacīrakehi nivāsāpanakammakāraṇaṃ. Taṃ karontā yathā gīvato paṭṭhāya vaddhe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti, evaṃ gopphakato paṭṭhāya kantitvāpi kaṭiyameva ṭhapenti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ^a^M2.0002^ea^ ‘‘kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantitvā gopphakesu ṭhapentī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Eṇeyyakakammakāraṇa^eb^nti eṇimigasadisakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Ayavalayāni datvā^eb^ti ayavalayāni paṭimuñcitvā. ^b^Ayasūlāni koṭṭentī^eb^ti kapparajaṇṇukakoṭīsu ayasūlāni pavesenti. ^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ tathākatakammakāraṇaṃ sattaṃ.

[03]^b^Baḷisamaṃsika^eb^nti balisehi maṃsuppāṭanakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Kahāpaṇika^eb^nti kahāpaṇamattaso chindanakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Koṭṭentī^eb^ti chindanti. ^b^Khārāpatacchika^eb^nti tacchetvā khārāpasiñcanakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Palighaparivattika^eb^nti palighassa viya parivattanakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Ekābaddhaṃ karonti^eb^ ayasūlassa koṭṭanena. ^b^Palālapīṭhaka^eb^nti palālapīṭhassa viya sarīrassa saṃvellanakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Kāraṇikā^eb^ti ghātanakārakā. ^b^Palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvā^eb^ti yathā palālapīṭhaṃ karontā palālaṃ vaṭṭiṃ katvā saṃvellanavasena puna veṭhenti, evaṃ karontīti attho. ^b^Chātakasunakhehī^eb^ti khuddakehi koleyyakasunakhehi. Te hi balavantā javayogā sūrā ca honti. ^b^Sahassabhaṇḍika^eb^nti sahassatthavikaṃ.
[03]^b^Yāhanti^eb^ yaṃ ahaṃ. ^b^Ya^eb^nti ca kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yena aha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Chinnamūlake^eb^ti taṇhāmūlassa ucchinnattā sañchinnamūlake.
[06]Vajjasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^ubhatobyūḷhasaṅgāmappavesanasadisa^eb^nti yuddhatthāya ubhatorāsikatacaturaṅginisenāmajjhappavesanasadisaṃ. ^b^Dānañca yuddhañca samānamāhū^eb^ti ettha kathaṃ panīdamubhayaṃ samānaṃ? Jīvitavināsabhīruko hi yujjhituṃ na sakkoti, bhogakkhayabhīruko dānaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti. ‘‘Jīvitañca rakkhissāmi, yujjhissāmī’’ti hi vadanto na yujjhati, jīvite pana ālayaṃ vissajjetvā ‘‘hatthapādādicchedo vā hotu maraṇaṃ vā, gaṇhissāmetaṃ issariya’’nti ussahantova yujjhati ^a^V2.0003^ea^. ‘‘Bhoge ca rakkhissāmi, dānañca dassāmī’’ti vadantopi na dadāti, bhogesu pana ālayaṃ pissajjetvā ‘‘mahādānaṃ dassāmī’’ti ussahantova deti. Evaṃ ^a^M2.0003^ea^ dānañca yuddhañca samaṃ hoti. Kiñca bhiyyo – ^b^appāpi santā bahuke jinanti,^eb^ yathā ca yuddhe appakāpi vīrapurisā bahuke bhīrupurise jinanti, evaṃ saddhādisampanno appakampi dānaṃ dadanto bahuvidhaṃ lobhadosaissāmacchariyadiṭṭhivicikicchādibhedaṃ tappaṭipakkhaṃ abhibhavati, bahuñca dānavipākaṃ adhigacchati. Evampi dānañca yuddhañca samānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appampi ce saddahāno dadāti, teneva so hoti sukhī paratthā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Agārassa hitaṃ kasigorakkhādi agāriyaṃ, taṃ natthi etthāti ^b^anagāriyaṃ,^eb^ pabbajjāti āha ^b^‘‘agārassa…pe… anagāriyaṃ pabbajja’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggatthāyā^eb^ti ettha cattāro upadhī – kāmupadhi, khandhupadhi, kilesupadhi, abhisaṅkhārupadhīti. Kāmāpi hi ‘‘yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo’’ti (a. ni. 9.34) evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa, tadassādanimittassa vā dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato upadhīyati ettha sukhanti iminā vacanatthena ‘‘upadhī’’ti vuccanti. Khandhāpi khandhamūlakassa dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, kilesāpi apāyadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, abhisaṅkhārāpi bhavadukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ‘‘upadhī’’ti vuccanti. Sabbesaṃ upadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggo pahānaṃ etthāti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbesaṃ khandhūpadhi…pe… nibbānassa atthāyā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Padhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^tapanīyā^eb^ti ettha kattuatthe anīya-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘tapantīti tapanīyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tapantī^eb^ti vibādhenti, viheṭhentīti attho. Tapanaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañca tassa uppādanena ceva anubalappadānena ca hitāti ^b^tapanīyā^eb^. Atha vā tapanti tenāti tapanaṃ, anutāpo, vippaṭisāroti attho. Tassa hetubhāvato hitāti ^b^tapanīyā. Anusocatī^eb^ti vippaṭisārī hutvā katākataṃ anugamma socati. Socanañhi katattā ca hoti akatattā ca. Tathā ceva pāḷiyaṃ vibhattaṃ. Nandayakkhādīnaṃ vatthūni pākaṭānīti tāni ^a^V2.0004^ea^ adassetvā ^a^M2.0004^ea^ dvebhātikavatthuṃ dassento ^b^‘‘te kirā’’^eb^ti ādimāha. Tattha ^b^te^eb^ti dve bhātaro. ^b^Puna kiṃ maggasī^eb^ti puna kiṃ icchasi.
[06]Tapanīyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^imañhi dhammadvaya^eb^nti kusalesu dhammesu asantuṭṭhitā, padhānasmiṃ anosakkanasaṅkhātaṃ dhammadvayaṃ. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘asantuṭṭhitā kusalesu dhammesū’’ti vacanena. ^b^Imaṃ dīpetī^eb^ti ‘‘yāva so uppajjati, na tāvāhaṃ santuṭṭho ahosi’’nti etaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā vakkhamānatthaṃ dīpeti. ^b^Padhānasmi^eb^nti vīriyārambhe. ^b^Imamattha^eb^nti ‘‘padhānasmiñcā’’tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ. Vīriyappavāhe vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanaṃ nivattanaṃ paṭivānaṃ, tadassa atthīti paṭivānī, na paṭivānī appaṭivānī, tassa bhāvo ^b^appaṭivānitā,^eb^ anosakkanāti āha ^b^‘‘appaṭivānitāti appaṭikkamanā anosakkanā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^anosakkanā^eb^ti appaṭinivatti.

[03]^b^Āgamanīyapaṭipadā^eb^ti samathavipassanāsaṅkhātā pubbabhāgapaṭipatti. Sā hi āgacchanti visesamadhigacchanti etāya, āgacchati vā visesādhigamo etāyāti āgamanīyā, sā eva paṭipajjitabbato paṭipadāti āgamanīyapaṭipadā. ^b^Appaṭivānapadhāna^eb^nti osakkanārahitappadhānaṃ, antarā anosakkitvā katavīriyanti attho.
[06]Upaññātasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe saṃyojanānaṃ hitā paccayabhāvenāti ^b^saṃyojaniyā,^eb^ tebhūmakā dhammā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dasannaṃ saṃyojanāna’’^eb^ntiādi. Saṃyojaniye dhamme assādato anupassati sīlenāti assādānupassī, tassa bhāvo ^b^assādānupassitā. Nibbidānupassitā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhanavasenā^eb^ti saṃyojaniyesu tebhūmakadhammesu nibbindanavasena. Jananaṃ ^b^jāti,^eb^ khandhānaṃ pātubhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘jātiyāti khandhanibbattito’’^eb^ti, khandhānaṃ tattha tattha bhave aparāparaṃ nibbattitoti attho. ^b^Khandhaparipāko^eb^^a^M2.0005^ea^ ekabhavapariyāpannānaṃ khandhānaṃ purāṇabhāvo. Ekabhavapariyāpannajīvitindriyappabandhavicchedavasena ^a^V2.0005^ea^ khandhānaṃ bhedo idha maraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘maraṇenāti khandhabhedato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Antonijjhānaṃ^eb^ cittasantāpo. ^b^Paridevo^eb^ nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa vācāvippalāpo. So ca sokasamuṭṭhānoti āha ^b^‘‘tannissitalālappitalakkhaṇehi paridevehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Lālappitaṃ^eb^ vācāvippalāpo, so ca atthato saddoyeva.

[03]^b^Dukkha^eb^nti idha kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘kāyapaṭipīḷanadukkhehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Manovighātadomanassehī^eb^ti manaso vighātakarehi domanassehi. Byāpādasampayogena manaso vihananarasañhi domanassaṃ. Bhuso āyāso ^b^upāyāso^eb^ yathā ‘‘bhusamādānaṃ upādāna’’nti, so ca atthato ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito dosoyeva. Kāyacittānañhi āyāsanavasena dosasseva pavattiākāro upāyāsoti vuccati saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno. Taṃ cuddasahi akusalacetasikehi añño eko cetasikadhammoti eke. Yaṃ visādoti ca vadanti.
[06]Saṃyojanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame yathā ‘‘kaṇhā gāvī’’tiādīsu kāḷavaṇṇena samannāgatā ‘‘kaṇhā’’ti vuccati, na evaṃ kāḷavaṇṇatāya dhammā ‘‘kaṇhā’’ti vuccanti, atha kho kaṇhābhijātinibbattihetuto appabhassarabhāvakaraṇato vā ‘‘kaṇhā’’ti vuccantīti dassento ^b^‘‘na kāḷavaṇṇatāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kaṇhatāyā^eb^ti kaṇhābhijātitāya. ^b^Kaṇhābhijātī^eb^ti ca apāyā vuccanti manussesu ca dobhaggiyaṃ. ^b^Sarasenā^eb^ti sabhāvena. Na hirīyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo, cittaṃ, taṃ sampayuttadhammasamudāyo vā. Tassa bhāvo ahirikkanti vattabbe ekassa ka-kārassa lopaṃ katvā ^b^ahirika^eb^nti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘ahirikanti ahirikabhāvo’’^eb^ti. Na ottappatīti anottāpī, puggalo, yathāvuttadhammasamudāyo vā, ^b^tassa^eb^ bhāvo ^b^anottappa^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘anottāpibhāvo’’^eb^ti.
[06]Kaṇhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0006^ea^ ‘‘sukkaṃ vattha’’ntiādīsu viya na vaṇṇasukkatāya dhammānaṃ sukkatā, atha kho ^a^V2.0006^ea^ sukkābhijātihetuto pabhassarabhāvakaraṇato cāti dassento ^b^‘‘na vaṇṇasukkatāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Sukkatāyā^eb^ti sukkābhijātitāya. Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya passantī jigucchatīti āha ^b^‘‘pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī’’^eb^ti. Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato bhāyatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhāyanalakkhaṇaṃ otappa’’^eb^nti. Idañca hirottappaṃ aññamaññavippayogī pāpato vimukhabhūtañca, tasmā nesaṃ idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ – ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ. Attādhipati hirī, lokādhipati otappaṃ. Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ. Sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappanti.

[03]Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā, vayaṃ, sūrabhāvaṃ, bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Kathaṃ? ‘‘Pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ na jātisampannānaṃ kammaṃ, hīnajaccānaṃ kevaṭṭādīnaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’’nti evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā ‘‘pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ daharehi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’’nti evaṃ vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā ‘‘pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ dubbalajātikānaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’’nti evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā ‘‘pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ andhabālānaṃ kammaṃ, na paṇḍitānaṃ, mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta’’nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti, samuṭṭhāpento ca hiriṃ nissāya pāpakammaṃ na karoti.

[03]Kathaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ? ‘‘Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi, catūsu parisāsu garahappatto bhavissasi, tato taṃ sīlavanto sabrahmacārī vivajjissantī’’ti paccavekkhitvā bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nissāya pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ.

[03]Kathaṃ ^a^M2.0007^ea^ attādhipati hirī? Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā ‘‘mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutadharassa na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ kātu’’nti pāpaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ attādhipati hirī. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘so attānaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatī’’ti (a. ni. 3.40).

[03]Kathaṃ ^a^V2.0007^ea^ lokādhipati ottappaṃ? Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā ‘‘sace kho tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ kareyyāsi, sabrahmacārino tāva taṃ jānissanti, mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā loke ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā devatā ca, tasmā te na yuttaṃ pāpaṃ kātu’’nti pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha – ‘‘mahā kho panāyaṃ lokasannivāso, mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno. Te dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti, tepi maṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha, bho, imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti. Santi devatā iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduniyo, tā dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti, tāpi maṃ jānissanti ‘passatha, bho, imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti…pe… so lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ…pe… pariharatī’’ti. Evaṃ lokādhipati ottappaṃ.

[03]^b^Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā^eb^ti ettha ^b^lajjā^eb^ti lajjanākāro, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitā hirī. ^b^Bhaya^eb^nti apāyabhayaṃ, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ pāpaparivajjane pākaṭaṃ hoti. Tattha yathā dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito, eko uṇho āditto. Tesu yathā sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto viññujātiko na gaṇhāti, itaraṃ ḍāhabhayena. Evaṃ paṇḍito lajjāya jigucchanto pāpaṃ na karoti, ottappena apāyabhayabhīto pāpaṃ na karoti, evaṃ ^b^lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ^eb^.

[03]Kathaṃ ^a^M2.0008^ea^ sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ? Ekacco hi jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā, satthumahattapaccavekkhaṇā, dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇā, sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi tattha gāravena sappatissavalakkhaṇaṃ hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Ekacco attānuvādabhayaṃ, parānuvādabhayaṃ, daṇḍabhayaṃ, duggatibhayanti evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi vajjato bhāyanto vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Ettha ca ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā hirottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā, na pana nesaṃ kadāci aññamaññavippayogo. Na hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ, pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti. Evamettha vitthārato atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā.
[06]Sukkasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^a^V2.0008^ea^^b^loka^eb^nti sattalokaṃ. ^b^Sandhārentī^eb^ti ācārasandhāraṇavasena dhārenti. ^b^Ṭhapentī^eb^ti mariyādāyaṃ ṭhapenti. ^b^Rakkhantī^eb^ti ācārasandhāraṇena mariyādāyaṃ ṭhapetvā rakkhanti. ^b^Garucittīkāravasena na paññāyethā^eb^ti garuṃ katvā citte karaṇavasena na paññāyetha, ayamācāro na labbheyya. ^b^Mātucchāti vā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādyattho. Tena mātulānīti vā ācariyabhariyāti vā garūnaṃ dārāti vāti ime saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha mātu bhaginī ^b^mātucchā^eb^. Mātulabhariyā ^b^mātulānī. Garūnaṃ dārā^eb^ mahāpitucūḷapitujeṭṭhabhātuādīnaṃ garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ bhariyā. ^b^Yathā ajeḷakā^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā ajeḷakādayo tiracchānā hirottapparahitā mātāti saññaṃ akatvā bhinnamariyādā sabbattha sambhedena vattanti, evamayaṃ manussaloko yadi lokapāladhammā na bhaveyyuṃ, sabbattha sambhedena vatteyya. Yasmā panime lokapālakadhammā lokaṃ pālenti, tasmā natthi sambhedoti.
[06]Cariyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^M2.0009^ea^^b^apaññattā^eb^ti ananuññātā, avihitā vā. ^b^Vasse^eb^ti vassārattaṃ sandhāya vadati, ^b^utuvasse^eb^ti hemantaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentā^eb^ti rukkhalatādīsu jīvasaññitāya evamāhaṃsu. ^b^Ekindriya^eb^nti ca kāyindriyaṃ atthīti maññamānā vadanti. ^b^Saṅghātaṃ āpādentā^eb^ti vināsaṃ āpādentā. ^b^Saṃkasāyissantī^eb^ti appossukkā nibaddhavāsaṃ vasissanti. ^b^Aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbā^eb^ti ettha aparajju gatāya assāti aparajjugatā, tassā aparajjugatāya atikkantāya, aparasmiṃ divaseti attho, tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase upagantabbāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbā^eb^ti māso gatāya assāti māsagatā, tassā māsagatāya atikkantāya, māse paripuṇṇeti attho. Tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamato parāya puṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase upagantabbāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
[06]Vassūpanāyikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Kammakāraṇavaggavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyavaggassa ^a^V2.0009^ea^ paṭhame appaṭisaṅkhāne na kampatīti ^b^paṭisaṅkhānabalaṃ,^eb^ upaparikkhanapaññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vīriyasīsena satta bojjhaṅge bhāventassa uppannaṃ balaṃ ^b^bhāvanābalaṃ^eb^. Vīriyupatthambhena hi kusalabhāvanā balavatī thirā uppajjati, tathā uppannā balavatī kusalabhāvanā balavanto satta bojjhaṅgātipi vuccanti. Atthato vīriyasambojjhaṅgasīsena satta bojjhaṅgā honti. Vuttampi cetaṃ – ‘‘tattha katamaṃ bhāvanābalaṃ? Yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṃ, idaṃ vuccati bhāvanābalaṃ. Sattapi bojjhaṅgā bhāvanābala’’nti (dha. sa. 1361).

[03]^b^Akampiyaṭṭhenā^eb^ti paṭipakkhehi akampanīyaṭṭhena. ^b^Durabhibhavanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti durabhibhavanīyaṭṭhena. ^b^Anajjhomaddanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhibhavitvā anavamaddanaṭṭhena. ^b^Etānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0010^ea^ etāni yathāvuttāni dvepi balāni. ^b^Etadaggaṃ nāgata^eb^nti ‘‘etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ balānaṃ yadidaṃ bhāvanābala’’nti evamettha etadaggaṃ nāgatanti attho.

[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye vivekaṃ nissitanti ^b^vivekanissitaṃ,^eb^ yathā vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ ‘‘vivekaja’’nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vivekavasena pavatto satisambojjhaṅgo ‘‘vivekanissito’’ti daṭṭhabbo. Nissayaṭṭho ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo, asatipi vā pubbāparabhāve ‘‘paṭiccasamuppādo’’ti ettha paccayena samuppādanaṃ viya avinābhāvidhammabyāpārā nissayanabhāvanā sambhavantīti. ‘‘Tadaṅgasamucchedanissaraṇavivekanissita’’nti vatvā paṭippassaddhivivekanissitassa avacanaṃ ‘‘satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī’’tiādinā idha bhāvetabbānaṃ sambojjhaṅgānaṃ vuttattā. Bhāvitabojjhaṅgassa hi sacchikātabbā balabojjhaṅgā, tesaṃ kiccaṃ paṭippassaddhiviveko. ^b^Ajjhāsayato^eb^ti ‘‘nibbānaṃ sacchikarissāmī’’ti pavattaajjhāsayato. Yadipi hi vipassanākkhaṇe saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, saṅkhāresu pana ādīnavaṃ disvā tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne ninnatāya ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissito hoti uṇhābhibhūtassa puggalassa sītaninnacittatā viya.

[03]^b^‘‘Pañcavidhavivekanissitampīti eke’’^eb^ti vatvā tattha yathāvuttavivekattayato aññaṃ vivekadvayaṃ ^a^V2.0010^ea^ uddharitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘te hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha jhānakkhaṇe tāva kiccato vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ, vipassanākkhaṇe ajjhāsayato paṭippassaddhivivekanissitaṃ bhāvetīti vattabbaṃ ‘‘evāhaṃ anuttaraṃ vimokkhaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī’’ti tattha ninnajjhāsayatāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā tesaṃ matenā’’^eb^tiādi. Heṭṭhā kasiṇajjhānaggahaṇena āruppānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tasmā ‘‘etesaṃ jhānāna’’nti imināpi tesaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo. Yasmā pahānavinayo viya virāganirodhāpi idhādhippetavivekena atthato nibbisiṭṭhā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘esa nayo virāganissitantiādīsū’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vivekatthā eva hi virāgādayo’’^eb^ti.

[03]Vossagga-saddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā. Vossajjanañhi pahānaṃ vissaṭṭhabhāvena nirodhanapakkhandanampi ca ^a^M2.0011^ea^. Tasmā vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena paṭipakkhassa pahānaṃ vossaggo, tathā vipassanākkhaṇe tanninnabhāvena, maggakkhaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇena vissaṭṭhasabhāvatā vossaggoti veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tattha pariccāgavossaggo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo^eb^ti ayaṃ missakavasena vutto satisambojjhaṅgo. ^b^Yathāvuttena pakārenā^eb^ti tadaṅgappahānasamucchedappahānappakārena tanninnatadārammaṇappakārena ca. Pubbe vossaggavacanasseva atthassa vuttattā āha ^b^‘‘sakalena vacanenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pariṇamanta^eb^nti vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgatanninnappakārena pariṇamantaṃ. ^b^Pariṇata^eb^nti maggakkhaṇe samucchedatadārammaṇappakārena pariṇataṃ. Pariṇāmo nāma idha paripākoti āha ^b^‘‘paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcā’’^eb^ti. Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena laddhasāmatthiyassa kilese pariccajituṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayañhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti yvāyaṃ nayo ‘‘vivekanissita’’ntiādinā satisambojjhaṅge vutto, sesesu dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīsupi eseva nayo, evaṃ tattha netabbanti attho.

[03]‘‘Vivekanissita’’ntiādīsu labbhamānamatthaṃ sāmaññato dassetvā idāni idhādhippetamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘idha panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sabbasaṅkhatehī^eb^ti sabbehi paccayasamuppannadhammehi. ^b^Sabbesa^eb^nti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ. ^b^Vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā^eb^ti nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā. ^b^Tañca kho^eb^ti tadeva satisambojjhaṅgaṃ.

[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^cittekaggatthāyā^eb^ti cittasamādhānatthāya, diṭṭhadhamme sukhavihārāyāti attho. Cittekaggatāsīsena hi diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro vutto. Sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavānaṃ vasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ. Te hi samāpajjitvā ‘‘ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmā’’ti icceva kasiṇaparikammaṃ ^a^V2.0011^ea^ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti. ^b^Vipassanāpādakatthāyā^eb^tiādīsu pana sekkhaputhujjanā ‘‘samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassāmā’’ti nibbattentā vipassanāpādakatthāya bhāventi.

[03]Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ‘‘ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.238; ma. ni. 1.147; saṃ. ni. 2.70; 5.834, 842) vuttanayā ^a^M2.0012^ea^ abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti, te ^b^abhiññāpādakatthāya^eb^ bhāventi. Ye aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā ‘‘sattāhaṃ acittā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā’’ti nibbattenti, te ^b^nirodhapādakatthāya^eb^ bhāventi. Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā ‘‘aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke uppajjissāmā’’ti nibbattenti, te ^b^bhavavisesatthāya^eb^ bhāventi.

[03]Yuttaṃ tāva cittekaggatāya bhavavisesatthatā viya vipassanāpādakatthatāpi catukkajjhānasādhāraṇāti tesaṃ vasena ‘‘cattāri jhānānī’’ti vacanaṃ, abhiññāpādakatthatā pana nirodhapādakatthatā ca catutthasseva jhānassa āveṇikā, sā kathaṃ catukkajjhānasādhāraṇā vuttāti? Paramparādhiṭṭhānabhāvato. Padaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānampi hi padaṭṭhānanti vuccati kāraṇakāraṇanti yathā ‘‘tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddha’’nti.

[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe^b^ sasakassa uppatanaṃ viya hotī^eb^ti pathavijigucchanasasakassa uppatanaṃ viya hoti. Tatthāyaṃ atthasallāpikā upamā – pathavī kira sasakaṃ āha – ‘‘he sasakā’’ti. Sasako āha – ‘‘ko eso’’ti. Kasmā mameva upari sabbairiyāpathe kappento uccārapassāvaṃ karonto maṃ na jānāsīti? Suṭṭhu tayā ahaṃ diṭṭho, mayā akkantaṭṭhānañhi aṅgulaggehi phuṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti, vissaṭṭhaudakaṃ appamattakaṃ, karīsaṃ kaṭakaphalamattaṃ, hatthiassādīhi pana akkantaṭṭhānampi mahantaṃ, passāvopi nesaṃ ghaṭamatto, uccāropi pacchimatto hoti, alaṃ mayhaṃ tayāti uppatitvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne patito. Tato naṃ pathavī āha – ‘‘aho dūraṃ gatopi nanu mayhaṃyeva upari patitosī’’ti? So puna taṃ jigucchanto uppatitvā aññattha patito. Evaṃ vassasahassampi uppatitvā uppatitvā patamāno sasako neva pathaviyā antaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti. ^b^Na koṭi^eb^nti na pubbakoṭiṃ. ^b^Itaresa^eb^nti vipañcitaññuneyyapadaparamānaṃ.

[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^V2.0012^ea^ samathehi adhikarīyati vūpasammatīti adhikaraṇaṃ, aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni nissāya uppanno vivādoyeva ^b^vivādādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā vā’’tiādinā (cūḷava. 215) catasso ^a^M2.0013^ea^ vipattiyo nissāya uppanno anuvādoyeva ^b^anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^. Pañcapi āpattikkhandhā ^b^āpattādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇa’’nti (cūḷava. 215) vacanato āpattiyeva ^b^āpattādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Yā saṅghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakamma’’nti (cūḷava. 215) evamāgataṃ catubbidhaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ ^b^kiccādhikaraṇa^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^apākaṭanāmo^eb^ti ‘‘selo, kūṭadanto’’tiādinā anabhiññāto. ^b^Yena vā kāraṇenā^eb^ti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Hetuattho hi kiriyākāraṇaṃ, na karaṇaṃ viya kiriyattho, tasmā nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti ‘‘annena vasati, ajjhenena vasatī’’tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ, na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ ‘‘yena vā kāraṇenā’’ti. Avibhāgato satataṃ pavattitaniratisayasāduvipulāmatarasasaddhammaphalatāya sāduphalaniccaphalitamahārukkhena bhagavā upamito. Sāduphalūpabhogādhippāyaggahaṇeneva hi rukkhassa sāduphalatā gahitāti. ^b^Upasaṅkamī^eb^ti upasaṅkanto. Sampattakāmatāya hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami, upasaṅkantoti ca vattabbataṃ labhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gatoti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti, upagatoti attho. ^b^Upasaṅkamitvā^eb^ti pubbakālakiriyāniddesoti āha ^b^‘‘upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tato^eb^ti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto ‘‘upasaṅkamī’’ti vutto, tato upagataṭṭhānato.

[03]^b^Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto^eb^ti yathā bhagavā ‘‘kacci te, brāhmaṇa, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya’’ntiādinā khamanīyādīni pucchanto tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi pubbabhāsitāya, evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo tadanukaraṇena bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosīti yojanā. Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sītodakaṃ viyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^sammodita^eb^nti saṃsanditaṃ. ^b^Ekībhāva^eb^nti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ. ^b^Khamanīya^eb^nti ‘‘idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ, kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyya’’nti ^a^M2.0014^ea^ pucchati. ^b^Yāpanīya^eb^nti āhārādippaṭibaddhavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena ^b^kacci appābādhaṃ^eb^. Dukkhajīvikābhāvena ^b^kacci appātaṅkaṃ^eb^. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya ^b^kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Tadanurūpabalayogato ^b^kacci balaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0013^ea^. Sukhavihārasambhavena ^b^kacci phāsuvihāro^eb^ atthīti sabbattha kacci-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo.

[03]Balappattā pīti ^b^pīti^eb^yeva. Taruṇapīti ^b^pāmojjaṃ^eb^. Sammodaṃ janeti karotīti sammodanīkaṃ, tadeva ^b^sammodanīyaṃ^eb^. Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti imaṃ pana atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Saritabbabhāvato^eb^ti anussaritabbabhāvato. ‘‘Saraṇīya’’nti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘sāraṇīya’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Suyyamānasukhato^eb^ti āpāthagatamadhurataṃ āha, ^b^anussariyamānasukhato^eb^ti vimaddaramaṇīyataṃ. ^b^Byañjanaparisuddhatāyā^eb^ti sabhāvaniruttibhāvena tassā kathāya vacanacāturiyamāha. ^b^Atthaparisuddhatāyā^eb^ti atthassa nirupakkilesataṃ. ^b^Anekehi pariyāyehī^eb^ti anekehi kāraṇehi.
[03]Atidūraaccāsannappaṭikkhepena nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ nāma gahitaṃ, taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthāsaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Gīvaṃ pasāretvā^eb^ti gīvaṃ parivaṭṭanavasena pasāretvā.

[03]^b^Etadavocā^eb^ti etaṃ ‘‘ko nu kho, bhante, hetū’’tiādipucchāvacanaṃ avoca. Teneva ‘‘etadavocā’’ti padaṃ uddharitvā ^b^duvidhā hi pucchā^eb^tiādinā pucchāvibhāgaṃ dasseti. Tattha agāre niyutto agāriko, tassa pucchā ^b^agārikapucchā^eb^. Agārikato añño anagāriko pabbajjūpagato, tassa pucchā ^b^anagārikapucchā^eb^. Kiñcāpi aññattha ‘‘janako hetu, paggāhako paccayo. Asādhāraṇo hetu, sādhāraṇo paccayo. Sabhāgo hetu, asabhāgo paccayo. Pubbakāliko hetu, sahapavatto paccayo’’tiādinā hetupaccayā vibhajja vuccanti. Idha pana ‘‘cattāro kho, bhikkhave, mahābhūtā hetu cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 3.86) viya hetupaccayasaddā samānatthāti dassento ^b^‘‘ubhayampetaṃ kāraṇavevacanamevā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Visamacariyā^eb^ti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso.

[03]^b^Abhikkantā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0015^ea^ atikkantā, vigatāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘khaye dissatī’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi ‘‘nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo’’ti upari vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhikkantataro^eb^ti ativiya kantataro manoramo, tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sundare dissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ko^eb^ti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko katamo? ^b^Me^eb^ti mama. ^b^Pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^Iddhiyā^eb^ti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. ^b^Yasasā^eb^ti iminā edisena parivārena paricchedena ca. ^b^Jala^eb^nti vijjotamāno. ^b^Abhikkantenā^eb^ti ativiya kantena kamanīyena abhirūpena. ^b^Vaṇṇenā^eb^ti chavivaṇṇena ^a^V2.0014^ea^ sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. ^b^Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā^eb^ti dasa disā pabhāsento, cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho. ^b^Abhirūpe^eb^ti uḷārarūpe sampannarūpe.

[03]‘‘Coro, coro; sappo, sappo’’tiādīsu ^b^bhaye āmeḍitaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Vijjha, vijjha; pahara, paharā’’tiādīsu ^b^kodhe^eb^. ‘‘Sādhu, sādhū’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 327.saṃ. ni. 2.127; 3.35; 5.1085) ^b^pasaṃsāyaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Gaccha, gaccha; lunāhi, lunāhī’’tiādīsu ^b^turite^eb^. ‘‘Āgaccha, āgacchā’’tiādīsu ^b^kotūhale^eb^. ‘‘Buddho, buddhoti cintento’’tiādīsu (bu. vaṃ. 2.44) ^b^acchare^eb^. ‘‘Abhikkamathāyasmanto, abhikkamathāyasmanto’’tiādīsu ^b^hāse^eb^. ‘‘Kahaṃ ekaputtaka, kahaṃ ekaputtakā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.353; saṃ. ni. 2.63) ^b^soke^eb^. ‘‘Aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha’’ntiādīsu (udā. 20; dī. ni. 3.305; cūḷava. 332) ^b^pasāde^eb^. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo avuttasamuccayatto. Tena garahāasammānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha ‘‘pāpo, pāpo’’tiādīsu ^b^garahāyaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Abhirūpaka, abhirūpakā’’tiādīsu ^b^asammāne^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Nayidaṃ āmeḍitavasena dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho atthadvayavasenāti dassento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ‘‘Abhikkanta’’nti vacanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakavasena vuttaṃ, taṃ pana bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammassa desanāti katvā tathā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā’’^eb^ti. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^Dosanāsanato^eb^ti rāgādikilesavidhamanato. ^b^Guṇādhigamanato^eb^ti sīlādiguṇānaṃ sampāpanato. Ye guṇe desanā adhigameti, tesu padhānabhūte tāva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘saddhājananato paññājananato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Saddhāpamukhā hi lokiyā guṇā, paññāpamukhā lokuttarā ^a^M2.0016^ea^.

[03]Sīlādiatthasampattiyā ^b^sātthato,^eb^ sabhāvaniruttisampattiyā ^b^sabyañjanato^eb^. Suviññeyyasaddappayogatāya ^b^uttānapadato,^eb^ saṇhasukhumabhāvena duviññeyyatthatāya ^b^gambhīratthato^eb^. Siniddhamudumadhurasaddappayogatāya ^b^kaṇṇasukhato,^eb^ vipulavisuddhapemanīyatthatāya ^b^hadayaṅgamato^eb^. Mānātimānavidhamanena ^b^anattukkaṃsanato,^eb^ thambhasārambhanimmaddanena ^b^aparavambhanato^eb^. Hitādhippāyappavattiyā paresaṃ rāgapariḷāhādivūpasamanena ^b^karuṇāsītalato,^eb^ kilesandhakāravidhamanena ^b^paññāvadātato^eb^. Karavīkarutamañjutāya ^b^āpātharamaṇīyato,^eb^ pubbāparāviruddhasuvisuddhatthatāya ^b^vimaddakkhamato^eb^. Āpātharamaṇīyatāya ^b^evaṃ suyyamānasukhato,^eb^ vimaddakkhamatāya hitajjhāsayappavattitatāya ca ^b^vīmaṃsiyamānahitato^eb^^a^V2.0015^ea^. ^b^Evamādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṃsāracakkanivattanato, saddhammacakkappavattanato, micchāvādavigamanato, sammāvādapatiṭṭhāpanato, akusalamūlasamuddharaṇato, kusalamūlasaṃropanato, apāyadvārapidhānato, saggamokkhadvāravivaraṇato, pariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanato, anusayasamugghātanatoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Adhomukhaṭṭhapita^eb^nti kenaci adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhāmukhajāta^eb^nti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ. ^b^Uparimukha^eb^nti uddhaṃmukhaṃ. ^b^Ugghāṭeyyā^eb^ti vivaṭaṃ kareyya. ^b^Hatthe gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘puratthābhimukho uttarābhimukho vā gacchā’’tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā ‘‘nissandehaṃ esa maggo, evaṃ gaccheyyā’’ti vadeyya. ^b^Kāḷapakkhacātuddasī^eb^ti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī.

[03]^b^Nikkujjitaṃ^eb^ ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ^b^ukkujjeyya^eb^. Heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya ^b^saddhammavimukhaṃ,^eb^ adhomukhaṭhapitatāya ^b^asaddhamme patita^eb^nti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. Kāmaṃ kāmacchandādayopi paṭicchādakā nīvaraṇabhāvato, micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā satte micchābhinivesanavasenāti āha ^b^‘‘micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna’’^eb^nti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vajjaṃ vadāmī’’ti (a. ni. 1.310). Sabbo apāyagāmimaggo ^b^kummaggo^eb^ ‘‘kucchito maggo’’ti katvā. Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā ^b^micchāmaggo^eb^. Teneva hi tadubhayappaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sappiādisannissayo padīpo ^a^M2.0017^ea^ na tathā ujjalo, yathā telasannissayoti ^b^telapajjotaggahaṇaṃ.^eb^^b^Etehi pariyāyehī^eb^ti etehi nikkujjitukkujjanappaṭicchannavivaraṇādiupamopamitabbākārehi.

[03]^b^Pasannakāra^eb^nti pasannehi kātabbaṃ sakkāraṃ. ^b^Saraṇa^eb^nti paṭisaraṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parāyaṇa’’^eb^nti. Parāyaṇabhāvo ca anatthanisedhanena atthasampaṭipādanena ca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘aghassa, tātā, hitassa ca vidhātā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aghassā^eb^ti dukkhatoti vadanti, pāpatoti pana attho yutto. Nissakke cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Ettha ca nāyaṃ gami-saddo nī-saddādayo viya dvikammako, tasmā yathā ‘‘ajaṃ gāmaṃ netī’’ti vuccati, evaṃ ‘‘bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī’’ti vattuṃ na sakkā. ‘‘Saraṇanti gacchāmī’’ti pana vattabbaṃ. Iti-saddo cettha luttaniddiṭṭho. Tassa cāyamattho – gamanañca tadadhippāyena bhajanaṃ jānanaṃ vāti dassento ^b^‘‘iti iminā adhippāyenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^bhajāmī^eb^tiādīsu purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ atthavacanaṃ. ^b^Bhajanaṃ^eb^ vā saraṇādhippāyena upasaṅkamanaṃ. ^b^Sevanaṃ^eb^ santikāvacaratā. ^b^Payirupāsanaṃ^eb^ vattappaṭivattakaraṇena upaṭṭhānanti ^a^V2.0016^ea^ evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasaraṇataṃyeva dīpeti. ‘‘Gacchāmī’’ti padassa bujjhāmīti ayamattho kathaṃ labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘yesaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe^eb^ti padadvayenapi phalaṭṭhā eva dassitā, na maggaṭṭhāti te dassento ^b^‘‘yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā’’^eb^ti āha. Nanu ca kalyāṇaputhujjanopi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjatīti vuccatīti? Kiñcāpi vuccati, nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā eva tathā vattabbā, na itare sammattaniyāmokkamanābhāvato. Tathā hi te eva vuttā ^b^‘‘apāyesu apatamāne dhāretī’’^eb^ti. Sammattaniyāmokkamanena hi apāyavinimuttisambhavo. ^b^Akkhāyatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādyattho, pakārattho vā. Tena ‘‘yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34) suttapadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, ^b^‘‘vitthāro’’^eb^ti vā iminā. Ettha ca ariyamaggo niyyānikatāya, nibbānaṃ tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti ubhayameva nippariyāyena dhammoti vutto. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ labhitvā ariyamaggo tadatthasiddhiyā saṃvattati, tathāpi yasmā ariyaphalānaṃ ‘‘tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā’’tiādivacanato maggena ^a^M2.0018^ea^ samucchinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānakiccatāya niyyānānuguṇatāya niyyānapariyosānatāya ca. Pariyattidhammassa pana niyyānikadhammasamadhigamahetutāyāti iminā pariyāyena vuttanayena dhammabhāvo labbhati eva. Svāyamattho pāṭhāruḷho evāti dassento ^b^‘‘na kevala’’^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03]Kāmarāgo bhavarāgoti evamādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahīyati etenāti ^b^rāgavirāgo^eb^ti ^b^maggo kathito^eb^. Ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa sokassa ca taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā ^b^anejamasokanti phalaṃ kathitaṃ. Appaṭikūla^eb^nti avirodhadīpanato kenaci aviruddhaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ paṇītanti vā attho. Paguṇarūpena pavattitattā, pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato vā ^b^paguṇaṃ^eb^. Sabbadhammakkhandhā kathitāti yojanā.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenā^eb^ti ‘‘yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.324, 357; ma. ni. 1.492; 3.54; a. ni. 6.12; pari. 274) evaṃ ^a^V2.0017^ea^ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā, ‘‘yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.324; ma. ni. 1.492; 3.54; a. ni. 6.12; pari. 274) ca evaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññenāti attho. ^b^Saṃhato^eb^ti ghaṭito, sametoti attho. Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatā eva. ^b^Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te^eb^ti te purisayugavasena cattāropi puggalavasena aṭṭheva ariyadhammassa paccakkhadassāvitāya dhammadasā. Tīṇi vatthūni saraṇanti gamanena tikkhattuṃ gamanena ca ^b^tīṇi saraṇagamanāni^eb^. ^b^Paṭivedesī^eb^ti attano hadayagataṃ vācāya pavedesi.

[03]Saraṇagamanassa visayappabhedaphalasaṃkilesabhedānaṃ viya kattuvibhāvanā tattha kosallāya hotīti saraṇagamanesu atthakosallatthaṃ ^b^‘‘saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati, saraṇagamanappabhedo, saraṇagamanaphalaṃ, saṃkileso, bhedoti ayaṃ vidhi veditabbo’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0019^ea^ vuttaṃ tena vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato. Kasmā panettha vodānaṃ na gahitaṃ, nanu vodānavibhāvanāpi tattha kosallāya hotīti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇena atthato dīpitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ. Yāni hi nesaṃ saṃkilesakāraṇāni aññāṇādīni, tesaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ anuppannānaṃ anuppādanena, uppannānañca pahānena vodānaṃ hotīti.

[03]Hiṃsatthassa dhātusaddassa vasenetaṃ padaṃ daṭṭhabbanti ^b^‘‘hiṃsatīti saraṇa’’^eb^nti vatvā taṃ pana hiṃsanaṃ kesaṃ, kathaṃ, kassa vāti codanaṃ sodhento ^b^‘‘saraṇagatāna’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^bhaya^eb^nti vaṭṭabhayaṃ. ^b^Santāsa^eb^nti cittutrāsaṃ. Teneva cetasikadukkhassa gahitattā ^b^dukkha^eb^nti kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ. ^b^Duggatiparikilesa^eb^nti duggatipariyāpannaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ. Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ parato ^b^phalakathāya^eb^ āvi bhavissati. ^b^Eta^eb^nti saraṇanti padaṃ. Evaṃ avisesato saraṇasaddassa padatthaṃ dassetvā idāni visesato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Hite pavattanenā^eb^ti ‘‘sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharathā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.64, 69) atthe niyojanena. ^b^Ahitā nivattanenā^eb^ti ‘‘pāṇātipātassa kho pāpako vipāko abhisamparāya’’ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena anatthato nivattanena. ^b^Bhayaṃ hiṃsatī^eb^ti hitāhitesu appavattippavattihetukaṃ byasanaṃ appavattikaraṇena vināseti buddho. ^b^Bhavakantārā uttāraṇena^eb^ maggasaṅkhāto dhammo. Itaro assāsadānena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti yojanā. ^b^Kārāna^eb^nti dānavasena pūjāvasena ca upanītānaṃ sakkārānaṃ. ^b^Vipulaphalappaṭilābhakaraṇena^eb^ sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati saṅgho anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvatoti adhippāyo. ^b^Imināpi pariyāyenā^eb^ti imināpi vibhajitvā vuttena kāraṇena.

[03]‘‘Sammāsambuddho ^a^V2.0018^ea^ bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti evaṃ pavatto tattha ratanattaye pasādo tappasādo, tadeva rattanattayaṃ garu etassāti taggaru, tabbhāvo taggarutā, tappasādo ca taggarutā ca tappasādataggarutā. Tāhi ^b^tappasādataggarutāhi^eb^. Vidhutadiṭṭhivicikicchāsammohaassaddhiyāditāya ^b^vihatakileso^eb^. Tadeva ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ gati tāṇaṃ leṇanti evaṃ pavattiyā ^b^tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo^eb^^a^M2.0020^ea^^b^saraṇagamanaṃ^eb^ saraṇanti gacchati etenāti. ^b^Taṃsamaṅgī^eb^ti tena yathāvuttacittuppādena samannāgato. ^b^Evaṃ upetī^eb^ti evaṃ bhajati sevati payirupāsati, evaṃ vā jānāti bujjhatīti evamattho veditabbo.

[03]Ettha ca pasādaggahaṇena lokiyasaraṇagamanamāha. Tañhi pasādappadhānaṃ. Garutāgahaṇena lokuttaraṃ. Ariyā hi ratanattayaguṇābhiññatāya pāsāṇacchattaṃ piya garuṃ katvā passanti, tasmā tappasādena vikkhambhanavasena vihatakileso, taggarutāya samucchedavasenāti yojetabbaṃ agāravakaraṇahetūnaṃ samucchindanato. Tapparāyaṇatā panettha taggatikatāti tāya catubbidhampi vakkhamānaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avisesena vā pasādagarutā jotitāti pasādaggahaṇena aveccappasādassa itarassa ca gahaṇaṃ, tathā garutāgahaṇenāti ubhayenapi ubhayaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ yojetabbaṃ.

[03]Maggakkhaṇe ijjhatīti yojanā. ^b^Nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā^eb^ti etena atthato catusaccādhigamo eva lokuttarasaraṇagamananti dasseti. Tattha hi nibbānadhammo sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena, maggadhammo bhāvanābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhiyamānoyeva saraṇagamanattaṃ sādheti, buddhaguṇā pana sāvakagocarabhūtā pariññābhisamayavasena, tathā ariyasaṅghaguṇā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatī’’^eb^ti. Ijjhantañca saheva ijjhati, na lokiyaṃ viya paṭipāṭiyā asammohappaṭivedhena paṭividdhattāti adhippāyo. Ye pana vadanti ‘‘na saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā pavattati, maggassa adhigatattā pana adhigatameva hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ lokiyavijjādayo viyā’’ti, tesaṃ lokiyameva saraṇagamanaṃ siyā, na lokuttaraṃ, tañca ayuttaṃ duvidhassapi icchitabbattā.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ. ^b^Saddhāpaṭilābho^eb^ ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā’’tiādinā. ^b^Saddhāmūlikā^eb^ti yathāvuttasaddhāpubbaṅgamā. ^b^Sammādiṭṭhi^eb^ buddhasubuddhataṃ, dhammasudhammataṃ, saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca lokiyāvabodhavaseneva sammā ñāyena dassanato. ^b^Saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhī^eb^ti etena saddhūpanissayā yathāvuttalakkhaṇā paññā lokiyasaraṇagamananti dasseti. Tenāha ^a^V2.0019^ea^^b^‘‘diṭṭhijukammanti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Diṭṭhiyeva attano paccayehi uju karīyatīti katvā ^a^M2.0021^ea^, diṭṭhi vā uju karīyati etenāti ^b^diṭṭhijukammaṃ,^eb^ tathāpavatto cittuppādo. Evañca katvā ‘‘tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo’’ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti, saddhāpubbaṅgamasammādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ pana cittuppādassa tappadhānatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Saddhāpaṭilābho^eb^ti iminā mātādīhi ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ viya ñāṇavippayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ dasseti, ^b^sammādiṭṭhī^eb^ti iminā ñāṇasampayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ.

[03]^b^Tayidaṃ^eb^ lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ. Attā sanniyyātīyati appīyati pariccajīyati etenāti ^b^attasanniyyātanaṃ,^eb^ yathāvuttaṃ diṭṭhijukammaṃ. Taṃ ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ etassāti tapparāyaṇo, puggalo cittuppādo vā, tassa bhāvo ^b^tapparāyaṇatā,^eb^ yathāvuttaṃ diṭṭhijukammameva. Saraṇanti adhippāyena sissabhāvaṃ antevāsikabhāvaṃ upagacchati etenāti ^b^sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ^eb^. Saraṇagamanādhippāyeneva paṇipatati etenāti ^b^paṇipāto^eb^. Sabbattha yathāvuttadiṭṭhijukammavaseneva attho veditabbo. ^b^Attapariccajana^eb^nti saṃsāradukkhanissaraṇatthaṃ attano atthabhāvassa pariccajanaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Buddhādīnaṃyevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ attasanniyyātanādīsupi tattha tattha vattabbaṃ. Evañhi tadaññanivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.

[03]Evaṃ attasanniyyātanādīni ekena pakārena dassetvā idāni aparehipi pakārehi dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tena pariyāyantarehipi attasanniyyātanaṃ katameva hoti atthassa abhinnattāti dasseti. ^b^Āḷavakādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sātāgirihemavatādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nanu cete āḷavakādayo maggeneva āgatasaraṇagamanā, kathaṃ tesaṃ tapparāyaṇatāsaraṇagamanaṃ vuttanti? Maggenāgatasaraṇagamanehipi ‘‘so ahaṃ vicarissāmi…pe… sudhammataṃ (saṃ. ni. 1.246; su. ni. 194). Te mayaṃ vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ…pe… sudhammata’’nti (su. ni. 182) ca tehi tapparāyaṇatākārassa paveditattā tathā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^So panesa ñāti…pe… vasenā^eb^ti ettha ñātivasena, bhayavasena, ācariyavasena, dakkhiṇeyyavasenāti paccekaṃ ‘‘vasenā’’ti padaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tattha ^b^ñātivasenā^eb^ti ñātibhāvavasena. Evaṃ sesesupi ^a^M2.0022^ea^. ^b^Dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātenā^eb^ti dakkhiṇeyyatāhetukena paṇipatanenāti attho. ^b^Itarehī^eb^ti ñātibhāvādivasappavattehi tīhi paṇipātehi. ^b^Itarehī^eb^tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vandatī^eb^ti paṇipātassa lakkhaṇavacanaṃ ^a^V2.0020^ea^. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikaṃ sandhāya vadati. Samparāyikañhi niyyānikaṃ vā aniyyānikaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ paccāsīsanto dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva karotīti adhippāyo. ^b^Saraṇagamanappabhedo^eb^ti saraṇagamanavibhāgo.

[03]Ariyamaggo eva lokuttaraṃ saraṇagamananti āha ^b^‘‘cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphala’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sabbadukkhakkhayo^eb^ti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa anuppādanirodho. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘cattāri ariyasaccāni, sammappaññāya passatī’’ti (dha. pa. 190) evaṃ vuttaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ dassanaṃ.

[03]^b^Niccato anupagamanādivasenā^eb^ti niccanti aggahaṇādivasena. ^b^Aṭṭhāna^eb^nti hetuppaṭikkhepo. ^b^Anavakāso^eb^ti paccayappaṭikkhepo. Ubhayenapi kāraṇameva paṭikkhipati. ^b^Ya^eb^nti yena kāraṇena. ^b^Diṭṭhisampanno^eb^ti maggadiṭṭhiyā samannāgato sotāpanno. ^b^Kañci saṅkhāra^eb^nti catubhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārampi. ^b^Niccato upagaccheyyā^eb^ti niccoti gaṇheyya. ^b^Sukhato upagaccheyyā^eb^ti ‘‘ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.76, 79) evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena sukhato gāhaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako pariḷāhavūpasamanatthaṃ mattahatthiparitāsito viya cokkhabrāhmaṇo ukkārabhūmiṃ kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagacchati. Attavāre kasiṇādipaññattisaṅgahatthaṃ ‘‘saṅkhāra’’nti avatvā ^b^‘‘kañci dhamma’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Imesupi ṭhānesu catubhūmakavaseneva paricchedo veditabbo tebhūmakavaseneva vā. Yaṃ yañhi puthujjano gāhavasena gaṇhāti, tato tato ariyasāvako gāhaṃ viniveṭheti.

[03]^b^Mātara^eb^ntiādīsu janikā ^b^mātā,^eb^ janako ^b^pitā,^eb^ manussabhūto khīṇāsavo ^b^arahā^eb^ti adhippeto. Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti? Etampi aṭṭhānaṃ, puthujjanabhāvassa pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca phaladassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Paduṭṭhacitto^eb^ti vadhakacittena paduṭṭhacitto. ^b^Lohitaṃ uppādeyyā^eb^ti jīvamānakasarīre ^a^M2.0023^ea^ khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya. ^b^Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyā^eb^ti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ saṅghaṃ ‘‘kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā’’ti (pari. 458) evaṃ vuttehi pañcahi kāraṇehi bhindeyya. ^b^Aññaṃ satthāra^eb^nti aññaṃ titthakaraṃ ‘‘ayaṃ me satthā’’ti evaṃ gaṇheyyāti ^b^netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī^eb^ti attho.

[03]^b^Na te^eb^^a^V2.0021^ea^^b^gamissanti apāya^eb^nti te buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā tannimittaṃ apāyaṃ na gamissanti, devakāyaṃ pana paripūressantīti attho. ^b^Dasahi ṭhānehī^eb^ti dasahi kāraṇehi. ^b^Adhigaṇhantī^eb^ti adhibhavanti.

[03]^b^Velāmasuttādivasenā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘karīsassa catutthabhāgappamāṇānaṃ caturāsītisahassasaṅkhānaṃ suvaṇṇapātirūpiyapātikaṃsapātīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ rūpiyasuvaṇṇahiraññapūrānaṃ sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ caturāsītiyā hatthisahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā dhenusahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā kaññāsahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṃ, caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṃ, aparimāṇassa ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa āhārassa pariccajanavasena sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni nirantaraṃ pavattavelāmamahādānato ekassa sotāpannassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ. Tato sataṃ sotāpannānaṃ dinnadānato ekassa sakadāgāmino, tato ekassa anāgāmino, tato ekassa arahato, tato ekassa paccekabuddhassa, tato sammāsambuddhassa, tato buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ, tato cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa vihārakaraṇaṃ, tato saraṇagamanaṃ mahapphalatara’’nti imamatthaṃ pakāsentassa ^b^velāmasuttassa^eb^ (a. ni. 9.20) vasena. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘yaṃ, gahapati, velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ, yo ekaṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ bhojeyya, idaṃ tato mahapphalatara’’ntiādi (a. ni. 9.20). ^b^Velāmasuttādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ^b^aggappasādasuttā^eb^dīnaṃ (a. ni. 4.34; itivu. 90) saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Aññāṇaṃ^eb^ vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ ajānanaṃ tattha sammoho, ‘‘buddho nu kho, na nu kho’’tiādinā vicikicchā ^b^saṃsayo. Micchāñāṇaṃ^eb^ tassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena viparītaggāho. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena anādarāgāravādīnaṃ ^a^M2.0024^ea^ saṅgaho. ^b^Na mahājutika^eb^nti na ujjalaṃ, aparisuddhaṃ apariyodātanti attho. ^b^Na mahāvipphāra^eb^nti anuḷāraṃ. ^b^Sāvajjo^eb^ti diṭṭhitaṇhādivasena sadoso. Lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ viya aggahitakālaparicchedaṃ jīvitapariyantameva hoti, tasmā tassa khandhabhedena bhedoti āha ^b^‘‘anavajjo kālakiriyāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^So^eb^ti anavajjo saraṇagamanabhedo. Satipi anavajjatte iṭṭhaphalopi na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘aphalo’’^eb^ti. Kasmā? ^b^Avipākattā^eb^. Na hi taṃ akusalanti.

[03]^b^Ko upāsako^eb^ti sarūpapucchā, tasmā ‘‘kiṃlakkhaṇo upāsako’’ti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Kasmā^eb^ti hetupucchā. Tena kena pavattinimittena upāsakasaddo tasmiṃ puggale niruḷhoti dasseti ^a^V2.0022^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kasmā upāsakoti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Saddassa abhidheyyo pavattinimittaṃ tadatthassa tabbhāvakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Kimassa sīla^eb^nti kīdisaṃ assa upāsakassa sīlaṃ, kittakena sīlenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma hotīti attho. ^b^Ko ājīvo^eb^ti ko assa sammāājīvo? So pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena hotīti sopi vibhajīyatīti. ^b^Kā vipattī^eb^ti kā sīlassa, ājīvassa vā vipatti. Anantarassa hi vidhi vā paṭisedho vāti. ^b^Kā sampatī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Yo kocī^eb^ti khattiyādīsu yo koci. Tena saraṇagamanamevettha kāraṇaṃ, na jātiādivisesoti dasseti. ^b^Upāsanato^eb^ti teneva saraṇagamanena tattha ca sakkaccakiriyāya ādaragāravabahumānādiyogena payirupāsanato. ^b^Veramaṇiyo^eb^ti veraṃ vuccati pāṇātipātādidussīlyaṃ, tassa maṇanato hananato vināsanato veramaṇiyo, pañca viratiyo viratippadhānattā tassa sīlassa. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘paṭivirato hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Micchāvaṇijjā^eb^ti na sammāvaṇijjā ayuttavaṇijjā asāruppavaṇijjā. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti akaraṇeneva pajahitvā. ^b^Dhammenā^eb^ti dhammato anapetena. Tena aññampi adhammikaṃ jīvikaṃ paṭikkhipati. ^b^Samenā^eb^ti avisamena. Tena kāyavisamādiduccaritaṃ vajjetvā kāyasamādinā sucaritena ājīvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Satthavaṇijjā^eb^ti āyudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ ^a^M2.0025^ea^ vā paṭilabhitvā tassa vikkayo. ^b^Sattavaṇijjā^eb^ti manussavikkayo. ^b^Maṃsavaṇijjā^eb^ti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo. ^b^Majjavaṇijjā^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa vikkayo. ^b^Visavaṇijjā^eb^ti visaṃ yojetvā visaṃ gahetvā vā tassa vikkayo. Tattha satthavaṇijjā paroparodhanimittatāya akaraṇīyā vuttā. Sattavaṇijjā abhujissabhāvakaraṇato, maṃsavisavaṇijjā vadhahetuto, majjavaṇijjā pamādaṭṭhānato.

[03]^b^Tassevā^eb^ti pañcaveramaṇilakkhaṇassa sīlassa ceva pañcamicchāvaṇijjālakkhaṇassa ājīvassa ca. ^b^Vipattī^eb^ti bhedo pakopo ca. ^b^Yāyā^eb^ti yāya paṭipattiyā. ^b^Caṇḍālo^eb^ti upāsakacaṇḍālo. ^b^Mala^eb^nti upāsakamalaṃ. ^b^Paṭikuṭṭho^eb^ti upāsakanihīno. Buddhādīsu kammakammaphalesu ca saddhāvipariyāyo assaddhiyaṃ micchādhimokkho, yathāvuttena assaddhiyena samannāgato ^b^assaddho^eb^. Yathāvuttasīlavipattiājīvavipattivasena ^b^dussīlo^eb^. ‘‘Iminā diṭṭhādinā idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ hotī’’ti – evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato ^b^kotūhalamaṅgaliko. Maṅgalaṃ paccetī^eb^ti diṭṭhamaṅgalādibhedaṃ maṅgalameva pattiyāyati. ^b^No kamma^eb^nti ^a^V2.0023^ea^ kammassakataṃ no pattiyāyati. ^b^Ito bahiddhā^eb^ti ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye. ^b^Dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesatī^eb^ti duppaṭipannaṃ dakkhiṇārahasaññī gavesati. ^b^Pubbakāraṃ karotī^eb^ti dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ paṭhamataraṃ karoti. Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapariyesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.

[03]Vipattiyaṃ vuttavipariyāyena ^b^sampatti^eb^ veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana viseso – catunnampi parisānaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena upāsakova ratanaṃ ^b^upāsakaratanaṃ^eb^. Guṇasobhākittisaddasugandhatāhi upāsakova padumaṃ ^b^upāsakapadumaṃ^eb^. Tathā ^b^upāsakapuṇḍarīko^eb^.

[03]^b^Ādimhī^eb^ti ādiatthe. ^b^Koṭiya^eb^nti pariyantakoṭiyaṃ. ^b^Vihāraggenā^eb^ti ovarakakoṭṭhāsena, ‘‘imasmiṃ gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ nāma phalaṃ pāpuṇātī’’tiādīnā taṃ taṃ vasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti attho. ^b^Ajjata^eb^nti ajja icceva attho.

[03]^b^Pāṇehi^eb^^a^M2.0026^ea^^b^upeta^eb^nti iminā tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattatī’’^eb^tiādīni vatvā puna jīvitenapi taṃ vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento saraṇagamanaṃ rakkhāmīti uppannaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘ahañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pāṇehi upeta^eb^nti hi yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ upetaṃ. Upento ca na vācāmattena na ekavāraṃ cittuppādamattena, atha kho pāṇānaṃ pariccajanavasenapi yāvajīvaṃ upetanti evamettha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^17-19^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^jāṇussoṇī^eb^ti netaṃ tassa mātāpitūhi kataṃ nāmaṃ, apica kho ṭhānantarappaṭilābhaladdhanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘jāṇussoṇīti ṭhānantaraṃ kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekaṃ ṭhānantara^eb^nti ekaṃ purohitaṭṭhānaṃ. Uṇhīsaādikakudhabhaṇḍehi saddhiṃ laddhaṃ tathā cassa raññā dinnanti vadanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rañño santike ca laddhajāṇussoṇisakkārattā’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aṭṭhamanavamesu natthi vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^20-21^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^dunnikkhitta^eb^nti duṭṭhu nikkhittaṃ padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ katvā manasi ṭhapitaṃ. Pajjati ñāyati attho etenāti ^b^padaṃ,^eb^ atthaṃ byañjayati pakāsetīti ^b^byañjanaṃ,^eb^ padameva. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘uppaṭipāṭiyā…pe… byañjananti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Padasamudāyabyatirekena visuṃ pāḷi nāma ^a^V2.0024^ea^ natthīti āha ^b^‘‘ubhayametaṃ pāḷiyāva nāma’’^eb^nti. Pakaṭṭhānañhi vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷiyeva pāḷīti vuccati. Sesamettha ekādasamañca uttānatthameva.
[06]Adhikaraṇavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^22-24^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyassa paṭhamadutiyatatiyāni uttānatthāneva.
[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^netabbo^eb^ti aññato āharitvā bodhetabbo, ñāpetabboti attho.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^no cepi paṭicchādetvā karontī^eb^ti pāṇātipātādīni karonto sacepi appaṭicchādetvā karonti. ^b^Paṭicchannamevā^eb^ti viññūhi garahitabbabhāvato ^a^M2.0027^ea^ paṭicchādanārahattā paṭicchannamevāti vuccati. Avīciādayo padesavisesā tatthūpapannā sattā ca nirayaggahaṇena gahitāti āha ^b^‘‘nirayoti sahokāsakā khandhā’’^eb^ti. Tiracchānayoni nāma visuṃ padesaviseso natthīti āha ^b^‘‘tiracchānayoniyaṃ khandhāva labbhantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti ^b^atthavaso,^eb^ hetūti āha ^b^‘‘atthavaseti kāraṇānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Araññavanapatthānī^eb^ti araññalakkhaṇappattāni vanapatthāni. Vanapattha-saddo hi saṇḍabhūte rukkhasamūhepi vattatīti araññaggahaṇaṃ. Vanīyati vivekakāmehi bhajīyati, vanute vā te attasampattiyā vasanatthāya yācanto viya hotīti vanaṃ, patiṭṭhahanti ettha vivekakāmā yathādhippetavisesādhigamenāti patthaṃ, vanesu patthaṃ gahanaṭṭhāne senāsanaṃ ^b^vanapatthaṃ. Kiñcāpī^eb^ti anujānanasambhāvanatthe nipāto. Kiṃ anujānāti? Nippariyāyato araññabhāvaṃ gāmato bahi araññanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nippariyāyenā’’^eb^tiādi. Kiṃ sambhāveti? Āraññakaṅganipphādakattaṃ. Yañhi āraññakaṅganipphādakaṃ, taṃ visesato araññanti vattabbanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ taṃ pañcadhanusatika’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā^eb^ti indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvā, tato bahi paṭṭhāyāti attho. ^b^Bahi indakhīlā^eb^ti vā yattha dve tīṇi indakhīlāni, ^a^V2.0025^ea^ tattha bahiddhā indakhīlato paṭṭhāya. Yattha taṃ natthi, tadarahaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāyāti vadanti. ^b^Gāmanta^eb^nti gāmasamīpaṃ. ^b^Anupacāraṭṭhāna^eb^nti niccakiccavasena na upacaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yattha na kasīyati na vapīyatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāra^eb^nti etena satthā attano vivekābhiratiṃ pakāseti. Tattha diṭṭhadhammo nāma ayaṃ paccakkho attabhāvo, sukhavihāro nāma catunnaṃ iriyāpathavihārānaṃ phāsutā. Ekakassa hi araññe antamaso uccāravassāvakiccaṃ upādāya sabbe iriyāpathā phāsukā honti, tasmā diṭṭhadhamme sukhavihāraṃ ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāra^eb^nti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamāno^eb^ti kathaṃ araññavāsena pacchimā janatā anukampitā hoti? Saddhāpabbajitā hi kulaputtā bhagavato araññavāsaṃ ^a^M2.0028^ea^ disvā ‘‘bhagavāpi nāma araññasenāsanāni na muñcati, yassa nevatthi pariññātabbaṃ na pahātabbaṃ na bhāvetabbaṃ na sacchikātabbaṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana maya’’nti cintetvā tattha vasitabbameva maññissanti, evaṃ khippameva dukkhassantakarā bhavissanti. Evaṃ pacchimā janatā anukampitā hoti. Etamatthaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘pacchime mama sāvake anukampanto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame vijjaṃ bhajantīti ^b^vijjābhāgiyā,^eb^ vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse vattantītipi ^b^vijjābhāgiyā. Padaṃ pacchindatī^eb^ti maggacittassa patiṭṭhaṃ upacchindati, maggacittaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na detīti attho. ^b^Ubbaṭṭetvā^eb^ti samucchedavasena samūlaṃ uddharitvā. ^b^Aṭṭhasu ṭhānesū^eb^ti buddhādīsu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu. ^b^Rāgassa khayavirāgenā^eb^ti rāgassa khayasaṅkhātena virāgena, rāgassa anuppattidhammatāpādanenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
[06]Bālavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthassa ^a^V2.0026^ea^ paṭhame bhavanti ettha patiṭṭhahantīti bhūmi, asappurisānaṃ bhūmi ^b^asappurisabhūmi. Sappurisabhūmiyampi^eb^ eseva nayo. Kataṃ na jānātīti ^b^akataññū,^eb^ asamatthasamāsoyaṃ gamakattā ‘‘asūriyapassā’’tiādīsu viya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kataṃ na jānātī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Akatavedī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānātī^eb^ti ‘‘idañcidañca mayhaṃ iminā kata’’nti saṅghamajjhagaṇamajjhādīsu pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānāti, na pakāsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Upaññāta^eb^nti thomanāvasena upagantvā ñātaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vaṇṇita’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^34^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye vassasataparimāṇamāyu assāti ^b^vassasatāyuko,^eb^ vassasatāyukatañca vassasatāyukakāle jātasseva hoti, nāññassāti āha ^b^‘‘vassasatāyukakāle jāto’’^eb^ti. Vassasataṃ jīvati sīlenāti ^b^vassasatajīvī. Vassasata^eb^nti ca accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sakalaṃ vassasataṃ jīvanto’’^eb^ti. Mātāpitūnaṃ mātāva bahūpakāratarāti tassāyeva padhānabhāvena paṭikātabbattā dakkhiṇaṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ vadanti. ^b^Hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvā^eb^ti khīraṃ sandhāya ^a^M2.0029^ea^ vadati. Lohitañhi khīrabhāvena pariṇāmaṃ gacchati. ^b^Tyāssā^eb^ti te assa. Sesamettha uttānameva.

[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti ettha yenādhippāyena so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami, taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘so hi brāhmaṇo’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Virajjhanapañha^eb^nti yaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho virajjhitvā kathesi, aviparītaṃ katvā sampādetuṃ na sakkoti, tādisaṃ pañhanti attho. ^b^Ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañha^eb^nti ubhohi koṭīhi yuttaṃ pañhaṃ. ‘‘Kiṃvādī bhavaṃ gotamo’’ti hi puṭṭho ‘‘kiriyavādimhī’’ti vā vadeyya ‘‘akiriyavādimhī’’ti vā, tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane ‘‘kiriyavādimhī’’ti ekā koṭi, ‘‘akiriyavādimhī’’ti dutiyāti koṭidvayayutto ayaṃ pañho. ^b^Uggilitu^eb^nti dve koṭiyo mocetvā kathetuṃ asakkonto bahi nīharituṃ atthato apanetuṃ na sakkhissati. Dve koṭiyo mocento hi taṃ bahi nīharati nāma. ^b^Niggilitu^eb^nti pucchāya dosaṃ datvā hāretuṃ asakkonto pavesetuṃ na sakkhissati. Tattha dosaṃ datvā hārento hi gilitvā viya adassanaṃ gamento paveseti nāma. ^b^Kiṃladdhiko^eb^ti kiṃddiṭṭhiko. Vadanti etenāti vādo, diṭṭhi. Ko vādo etassāti ^b^kiṃvādī. Kimakkhāyī^eb^ti kimabhidhāyī, kīdisī dhammakathā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiṃ nāma…pe… pucchatī’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^a^V2.0027^ea^ dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti ^b^dakkhiṇeyyā^eb^. Āhunaṃ vuccati dānaṃ, taṃ arahantīti ^b^āhuneyyā^eb^.

[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame kathamayaṃ migāramātā nāma jātāti āha ^b^‘‘sā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sabbajeṭṭhakassa puttassā^eb^ti attano puttesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ jātassa puttassa. ^b^Ayyakaseṭṭhinova samānanāmakattā^eb^ti migāraseṭṭhinā eva sadisanāmakattā. Tassā kira sabbajeṭṭhassa puttassa nāmaggahaṇadivase ayyakassa migāraseṭṭhisseva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. ^b^Anibaddhavāso hutvā^eb^ti ekasmiṃyeva vihāre nibaddhavāso ahutvā. ^b^Dhuvaparibhogānī^eb^ti niyataparibhogāni. Nanu bhagavā kadāci cārikampi pakkamati, kathaṃ tāni senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogena paribhuñjīti āha ^b^‘‘utuvassaṃ cārikaṃ caritvāpī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^utuvassa^eb^nti hemantagimhe sandhāya vadati. ^b^Maggaṃ ṭhapetvā^eb^ti therassa āgamanamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā. ^b^Uṇhavalāhakā^eb^ti uṇhautuno ^a^M2.0030^ea^ paccayabhūtameghamālāsamuṭṭhāpakā devaputtā. Tesaṃ kira tathācittuppādasamakālameva yathicchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ uṇhaṃ pharamānā, valāhakamālā nātibahalā ito cito nabhaṃ chādentī vidhāvati. Esa nayo ^b^sītavalāhakavassavalāhakāsu. Abbhavalāhakā^eb^ pana devatā sītuṇhavassehi vinā kevalaṃ abbhapaṭalasseva samuṭṭhāpakā veditabbā. Kevalaṃ vā vātasseva, teneva devatā vātavalāhakā.

[03]Ettha ca yaṃ vassāne ca sisire ca abbhaṃ uppajjati, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pākatikameva. Yaṃ pana abbhamhiyeva atiabbhaṃ sattāhampi candasūriye chādetvā ekandhakāraṃ karoti, yañca cittavesākhamāsesu abbhaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena uppannaṃ abbhanti veditabbaṃ. Yo ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ utumhi uttaradakkhiṇādipakativāto hoti, ayaṃ utusamuṭṭhāno. Vātepi vanarukkhakkhandhādippadālano ativāto nāma atthi. Ayañceva, yo ca aññopi akālavāto, ayañca devatānubhāvena nibbatto. Yaṃ gimhāne uṇhaṃ, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānikaṃ pākatimeva. Yaṃ pana uṇhepi atiuṇhaṃ sītakāle ca uppannaṃ uṇhaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena nibbattaṃ. Yaṃ vassāne ca hemante ca sītaṃ hoti, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva. Yaṃ pana sītepi atisītaṃ, gimhe ca uppannaṃ sītaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena nibbattaṃ. Yaṃ vassike cattāro māse vassaṃ, taṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva, yaṃ pana vasseyeva ativassaṃ, yañca cittavesākhamāsesu vassaṃ, taṃ devatānubhāvena nibbattaṃ.

[03]Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira vassavalāhakadevaputto tagarakūṭavāsikhīṇāsavattherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Thero – ‘‘kosi tva’’nti pucchi. Ahaṃ, bhante, vassavalāhako devaputtoti ^a^V2.0028^ea^. Tumhākaṃ kira cittena devo vassatīti? Āma, bhanteti. Passitukāmā mayanti. Temissatha, bhanteti. Meghasīsaṃ vā gajjitaṃ vā na paññāyati, kathaṃ temissāmāti? Bhante, amhākaṃ cittena devo vassati, tumhe paṇṇasālaṃ pavisathāti. Sādhu devaputtāti pāde dhovitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi. Devaputto tasmiṃ pavisanteyeva ekaṃ gītaṃ gāyitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipi, samantā tiyojanaṭṭhānaṃ ekameghaṃ ahosi. Thero aḍḍhatinto paṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhoti.

[03]Kāmaṃ ^a^M2.0031^ea^ heṭṭhā vuttāpi devatā cātumahārājikāva, tā pana tena tena visesena vatvā idāni tadaññe paṭhamabhūmike kāmāvacaradeve sāmaññato gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘cātumahārājikā’’^eb^ti āha. Dhataraṭṭhavirūḷhakavirūpakkhakuverasaṅkhātā cattāro mahārājāno etesanti ^b^cātumahārājikā,^eb^ te sinerussa pabbatassa vemajjhe honti. Tesu pabbataṭṭhakāpi atthi ākāsaṭṭhakāpi. Tesaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā. Khiḍḍāpadosikā manopadosikā candimā devaputto sūriyo devaputtoti ete sabbepi cātumahārājikadevalokaṭṭhā eva.

[03]^b^Tāvatiṃsā^eb^ti tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ nāmaṃ, tepi atthi pabbataṭṭhakā, atthi ākāsaṭṭhakā, tesaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā. Tathā ^b^yāmā^eb^dīnaṃ. Ekadevalokepi hi devānaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ appattā nāma natthi. Tattha maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ macalagāme kālaṃ katvā tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti taṃ sahacāritaṃ ṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ, tadeva tāvatiṃsaṃ, taṃ nivāso etesanti tāvatiṃsāti vadanti. Yasmā pana sesacakkavāḷesupi chakāmāvacaradevalokā atthi. Vuttampi cetaṃ ‘‘sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ sahassaṃ tāvatiṃsāna’’nti (a. ni. 3.81). Tasmā nāmapaṇṇattiyevesā tassa devalokassāti veditabbā. Dukkhato yātā apayātāti ^b^yāmā^eb^. Attano sirisampattiyā tusaṃ itā gatāti ^b^tusitā^eb^. Nimmāne rati etesanti ^b^nimmānaratino^eb^. ^b^Vasavattī devatā^eb^ti paranimmitavasavattino devā. Paranimmitesu bhogesu vasaṃ vattentīti ^b^paranimmitavasavattino^eb^.

[03]Brūhito parivuddho tehi tehi jhānādīhi visiṭṭhehi guṇehīti brahmā. Vaṇṇavantatāya ceva dīghāyukatāya ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahanto brahmāti ^b^mahābrahmā^eb^. Tassa parisāyaṃ bhavā paricārikāti ^b^brahmapārisajjā^eb^. Tasseva purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti ^b^brahmapurohitā^eb^. Ābhassarehi parittā ābhā etesanti ^b^parittābhā^eb^. Appamāṇā ābhā etesanti ^b^appamāṇābhā^eb^. Dīpikāya acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati vissaratīti ^b^ābhassarā,^eb^ yathāvuttappabhāya ābhāsanasīlā vā ^b^ābhassarā. Subhā^eb^ti sobhanā pabhā. ^b^Subhā^eb^ti hi ^a^V2.0029^ea^ ekagghanā niccalā sarīrābhā vuccati ^a^M2.0032^ea^, sā parittā subhā etesanti ^b^parittasubhā^eb^. Appamāṇā subhā etesanti ^b^appamāṇasubhā^eb^. Subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā, subhena sarīrappabhāvaṇṇena ekagghanā suvaṇṇamañjūsāya ṭhapitasampajjalitakañcanapiṇḍasassirikāti ^b^subhakiṇṇā^eb^. Tattha sobhanāya pabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe bhā-saddassa rassattaṃ antima ṇa-kārassa ha-kārañca katvā ^b^‘‘subhakiṇhā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vipulaphalā vehapphalā. ^b^Vipulaphalā^eb^ti ca vipulasantasukhavaṇṇādiphalā. Appakena kālena attano ṭhānaṃ na vijahantīti ^b^avihā^eb^. Kenaci na tapanīyāti ^b^atappā^eb^. Akicchena sukhena passitabbā manuññarūpatāyāti ^b^sudassā^eb^. Suparisuddhadassanatāya sammā passanti sīlenāti ^b^sudassī^eb^. Ukkaṭṭhasampattīhi yogato natthi etesaṃ kaniṭṭhā sampattīti ^b^akaniṭṭhā^eb^.
[03]^b^Kāyasakkhīhī^eb^ti nāmakāyena desanāya sampaṭicchanavasena sakkhibhūtehi. ^b^Halāhala^eb^nti kolāhalaṃ. ^b^Mahaggatacittenā^eb^ti catutthajjhānapādakena abhiññācittena.

[03]Nanu ca ‘‘ajjhattanti kāmabhavo, bahiddhāti rūpārūpabhavo’’ti ca ayuttametaṃ? Yasmiñhi bhave sattā bahutaraṃ kālaṃ vasanti, so nesaṃ ajjhattaṃ. Yasmiñca appataraṃ kālaṃ vasanti, so nesaṃ bahiddhāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Rūpārūpabhave ca sattā cirataraṃ vasanti, appataraṃ kāmabhave, tasmā ‘‘ajjhattanti kāmabhavo, bahiddhāti rūpārūpabhavo’’ti kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Catutthameva koṭṭhāsa^eb^nti vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyisaṅkhātaṃ catutthaṃ asaṅkhyeyyakappaṃ. ^b^Itaresū^eb^ti saṃvaṭṭasaṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyivivaṭṭasaṅkhātesu tīsu asaṅkhyeyyakappesu. ^b^Ālayo^eb^ti saṅgo. ^b^Patthanā^eb^ti ‘‘kathaṃ nāma tatrūpapannā bhavissāmā’’ti abhipatthanā. ^b^Abhilāso^eb^ti tatrūpapajjitukāmatā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^tiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigameti.

[03]Etthāyaṃ adhippāyo – kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kenacipi pakārena vikkhambhanamattenapi avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattaggāhassa visesapaccayoti ajjhattaṃ nāma. Tattha bandhanaṃ ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ, tena saṃyutto ^b^ajjhattasaṃyojano^eb^. Tabbipariyāyato ^b^bahiddhāsaṃyojano^eb^ti.

[03]Chandarāgavaseneva ^a^M2.0033^ea^ ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ dassetvā idāni orambhāgiyauddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanavasenapi dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘orambhāgiyāni vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, paṭisandhiyā paccayabhāvena taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti ^b^orambhāgiyāni^eb^. Tattha ca kammunā ^a^V2.0030^ea^ vipākaṃ sattena ca dukkhaṃ saṃyojentīti ^b^saṃyojanāni,^eb^ sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsakāmarāgapaṭighā. Uddhaṃ vuccati rūpārūpadhātu, vuttanayenetaṃ uddhaṃ bhajantīti ^b^uddhambhāgiyāni,^eb^ saṃyojanāni. Rūparāgārūparāgamānuddhaccāvijjā. Atha vā orambhāgo vuccati kāmadhātu rūpārūpabhavato heṭṭhābhūtattā, tatrūpapattiyā paccayabhāvato orambhāgassa hitānīti ^b^orambhāgiyāni^eb^ yathā ‘‘vacchāyogo duhako’’ti. Uddhambhāgo nāma mahaggatabhāvo, tassa hitāni ^b^uddhambhāgiyāni^eb^. Pādesu baddhapāsāṇo viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā ākaḍḍhamānākārāni honti. Hatthehi gahitarukkhasākhā viya pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni upari ākaḍḍhamānākārāni. Yesañhi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni appahīnāni, te bhavaggepi nibbatte etāni ākaḍḍhitvā kāmabhaveyeva pātenti, tasmā etāni pañca gacchantaṃ vārenti, gataṃ puna ānenti. Rūparāgādīni pañca gacchantaṃ na vārenti, āgantuṃ pana na denti.

[03]Asamucchinnesu orambhāgiyasaṃyojanesu laddhapaccayesu uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni agaṇanūpagāni hontīti labbhamānānampi puthujjanānaṃ vasena avibhajitvā ariyānaṃ yogavasena vibhajitukāmo ^b^‘‘ubhayampi ceta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^vaṭṭanissitamahājanassā^eb^ti puthujjane sandhāya vadati. ^b^Dvedhā paricchinno^eb^ti kāmasugatirūpārūpabhavavasena dvīhi pakārehi paricchinno.

[03]^b^Vacchakasālopamaṃ^eb^ uttānatthameva. Opammasaṃsandane pana kassaci kilesassa avikkhambhitattā, kathañcipi avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayattā, imesaṃ sattānaṃ abbhantaraṭṭhena ^b^anto^eb^ nāma. Rūpārūpabhavo tabbipariyāyato ^b^bahi^eb^ nāma. Tathā hi yassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, so ajjhattasaṃyojano vutto. Yassa tāni pahīnāni, so bahiddhāsaṃyojano. Tasmā anto asamucchinnabandhanatāya bahi ca pavattamānabhavaṅgasantānatāya ^b^antobaddho bahisayito^eb^^a^M2.0034^ea^ nāma. Nirantarappavattabhavaṅgasantānavasena hi sayitavohāro. Kāmaṃ nesaṃ bahibandhanampi asamucchinnaṃ, antobandhanassa pana mūlatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṃyojanaṃ pana tesaṃ kāmāvacarūpanibaddhamevā’’^eb^ti. Iminā nayena sesattayepi attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Ettāvatā ca kirā^eb^ti ^b^kira^eb^-saddo arucisaṃsūcanattho. Tenettha ācariyavādassa attano aruccanabhāvaṃ dīpeti. ‘‘Sīlavā’’ti anāmaṭṭhavisesasāmaññato sīlasaṅkhepena gahitaṃ, tañca catubbidhanti ācariyatthero ^b^‘‘catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīlesu. ^b^Jeṭṭhakasīla^eb^nti padhānasīlaṃ. ^b^Ubhayatthā^eb^ti uddesaniddesesu, niddese viya uddesepi ^a^V2.0031^ea^ pātimokkhasaṃvarova therena vutto ‘‘sīlavā’’ti vuttattāti adhippāyo. Sīlaggahaṇañhi pāḷiyaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaravaseneva āgataṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvaroyevā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu ca sikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti. ^b^Tīṇī^eb^ti indriyasaṃvarasīlādīni. ^b^Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī^eb^ti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiṃ atthi yathā ‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvaro’’ti? Ācariyassa sammukhatāya appaṭikkhipanto upacārena pucchanto viya vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ananujānanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Chadvārarakkhāmattakamevā^eb^ti tassa sallahukabhāvamāha cittādhiṭṭhānabhāvamattena paṭipākatikabhāvāpattito. Itaradvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Paccayuppattimattaka^eb^nti phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Uppādanahetukā hi paccayānaṃ uppatti. ^b^Idamattha^eb^nti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo. ^b^Nippariyāyenā^eb^ti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa paripālanavasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti. Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^so^eb^ pātimokkhasaṃvaro. ^b^Sesāni^eb^ indriyasaṃvarādīni.

[03]^b^Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^ti ^a^M2.0035^ea^ yo hi naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvāro. So pana yasmā evaṃbhūto tena samannāgato nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pātīmokkhasaṃvarena samannāgato’’^eb^ti.

[03]Aparo nayo – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato, pāpakiriyāya ca sukarabhāvato, puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanato gamanasīloti pātī, maraṇavasena tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīlo vā pātī, sattasantāno, cittameva vā. Taṃ pātiṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti ^b^pātimokkhaṃ^eb^. Cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimuttoti vuccati. Vuttañhi ‘‘cittavodānā visujjhantī’’ti, ‘‘anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimutta’’nti (mahāva. 28) ca.

[03]Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti, ‘‘avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata’’nti ^a^V2.0032^ea^ (saṃ. ni. 2.124) hi vuttaṃ, tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. ‘‘Kaṇṭhekāḷo’’tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā.
[03]Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi –
[22]‘‘Cittena nīyate loko, cittena parikassatī’’ti; (Saṃ. ni. 1.62);
[07]Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhādisaṃkileso. Vuttañhi –
[22]‘‘Taṇhā janehi purisaṃ, (saṃ. ni. 1.56-57) taṇhādutiyo puriso’’ti (itivu. 15, 105; a. ni. 4.9) ca ādi;
[07]Tato pātito mokkhoti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^.
[03]Atha ^a^M2.0036^ea^ vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi –
[22]‘‘Chasu loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava’’nti (saṃ. ni. 1.70; su. ni. 171);
[07]Tato chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato pātito mokkhoti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^.
[03]Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^.

[03]Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā ‘‘patī’’ti vuccati, muccati etenāti mokkho, patino mokkho patimokkho tena paññattattāti, patimokkho eva ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttaṭṭhena mokkho cāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘pātimokkhanti ādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhameta’’nti (mahāva. 135) vitthāro.

[03]Atha ^a^V2.0033^ea^ vā pa-iti pakāre, atīti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena, samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Pati pati mokkhoti vā patimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho. Patimokkho eva ^b^pātimokkho^eb^. Mokkho vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa patibimbabhūtoti patimokkho. Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhaṃyeva ^b^pātimokkhaṃ^eb^.
[03]Atha vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati, mokkhābhimukhanti vā patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhameva ^b^pātimokkha^eb^nti evamettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Ācāragocarasampanno^eb^ti kāyikavācasikaavītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena, navesiyādigocaratādisaṅkhātena gocarena sampanno, sampannaācāragocaroti ^a^M2.0037^ea^ attho. ^b^Appamattakesū^eb^ti parittakesu anāpattigamanīyesu. ‘‘Dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattesū’’ti apare. ^b^Vajjesū^eb^ti gārayhesu. Te pana ekantato akusalasabhāvā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘akusaladhammesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhayadassī^eb^ti bhayato dassanasīlo, paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā bhāyanasīlo. ^b^Sammā ādiyitvā^eb^ti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbasova ādiyitvā. ^b^Sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummanti samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhatī’’^eb^ti atthamāha, sikkhāpadameva hi samādātabbaṃ sikkhitabbañcāti adhippāyo. ^b^Yaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu mūlapaññattianupaññattisabbatthapaññattipadesapaññattiādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ. Yaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ, taṃ pana dvāravasena duvidhamevāti āha ^b^‘‘kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe ^b^sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu kassaci visuṃ aggahaṇato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṃ sabba’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^Aññataraṃ devaghaṭa^eb^nti aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ. ^b^Āgāmī hotī^eb^ti paṭisandhivasena āgamanasīlo hoti. ^b^Āgantā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Iminā aṅgenā^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena.

[03]Sukkhavipassako yebhuyyena catudhātuvavatthānamukhena kammaṭṭhānābhinivesī hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sukkhavipassakassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikabhikkhuno’’^eb^ti. Vuttamevatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā nigamento ^b^‘‘paṭhamena aṅgenā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Cittassa ^a^V2.0034^ea^ sukhumabhāvo idha sukhamattabhāvamāpannena daṭṭhabboti āha ^b^‘‘sabbāpi hi tā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tantivasenā^eb^ti kevalaṃ tantiṭṭhapanavasena, na pana therassa kassaci maggassa vā phalassa vā uppādanatthāya, nāpi sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ yojanatthāyāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^mahākaccāno^eb^ti gihikāle ujjenirañño purohitaputto abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ca. Varaṇā nāma rukkho, tassa avidūre bhavattā nagarampi varaṇasaddena vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘varaṇā nāma ekaṃ nagara’’^eb^nti. Dvandapadassa paccekaṃ abhisambandho hotīti ^a^M2.0038^ea^ hetusaddaṃ paccekaṃ yojetvā dassento ^b^‘‘kāmarāgābhinivesahetū’’^eb^tiādimāha. Hetusaddena sambandhe sati yo attho sambhavati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^kāmarāgena abhiniviṭṭhattā^eb^ti etena kāmarāgābhinivesahetūti imassa atthaṃ dīpeti, tathā ^b^vinibaddhattā^eb^tiādīhi kāmarāgavinibaddhahetūtiādīnaṃ. ^b^Tato mukho^eb^ti tadabhimukho. ^b^Māna^eb^nti āḷhakādimānabhaṇḍaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.

[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^madhurāya^eb^nti uttaramadhurāyaṃ. ^b^Gundāvane^eb^ti kaṇhagundāvane, kāḷapippalivaneti attho. ^b^Jarājiṇṇe^eb^ti jarāya jiṇṇe, na byādhiādīnaṃ vasena jiṇṇasadise nāpi akālikena jarāya abhibhūte. ^b^Vayovuddhe^eb^ti jiṇṇattā eva cassa vayovuddhippattiyā vuddhena sīlādivuddhiyā. ^b^Jātimahallake^eb^ti jātiyā mahantatāya cirarattatāya mahallake, na bhogaparivārādīhīti attho. ^b^Addhagate^eb^ti ettha ^b^addha^eb^-saddo dīghakālavācīti āha ^b^‘‘dīghakāladdhānaṃ atikkante’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vayo^eb^ti purimapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘pacchimavaya’’^eb^nti, vassasatassa tatiyakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ pacchimavayaṃ anuppatteti attho.

[03]Bhavati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ^b^bhūmi,^eb^ kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘yena kāraṇenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paripakko^eb^ti pariṇato, vuddhibhāvaṃ pattoti attho. ^b^Moghajiṇṇo^eb^ti anto thirakaraṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhāvena tucchajiṇṇo nāma. Bāladārakopi daharoti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘yuvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Atikkantapaṭhamavayā eva sattā sabhāvena palitasirā hontīti paṭhamavaye ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘susukāḷakeso’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Bhadrenā^eb^ti laddhakena. Ekacco hi daharopi samāno kāṇo vā hoti kuṇiādīnaṃ vā aññataro, so na bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato nāma hoti. Yo pana abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko sabbasampattisampanno yaṃ yadeva alaṅkāraparihāraṃ icchati, tena tena alaṅkato devaputto viya carati, ayaṃ bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato nāma hoti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yena yobbanena samannāgato’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Yamhi^eb^^a^V2.0035^ea^^b^saccañca dhammo cā^eb^ti yamhi puggale soḷasahākārehi paṭividdhattā catubbidhaṃ saccaṃ, ñāṇena sacchikatattā navavidhalokuttaradhammo ca atthi. ^b^Ahiṃsā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0039^ea^ desanāmattametaṃ, yamhi pana catubbidhāpi appamaññābhāvanā atthīti attho. ^b^Saṃyamo damo^eb^ti sīlañceva indriyasaṃvaro ca. ^b^Vantamalo^eb^ti maggañāṇena nīhaṭamalo. ^b^Dhīro^eb^ti dhitisampanno. ^b^Thero^eb^ti so imehi thirabhāvakāraṇehi samannāgatattā theroti pavuccatīti attho.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^‘‘corā balavanto hontī’’^eb^ti padaṃ uddharitvā yehi kāraṇehi te balavanto honti, tesaṃ sabbhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘pakkhasampannā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^nivāsaṭṭhānasampannatā^eb^ giriduggādisabbhāvato. ^b^Atiyātu^eb^nti anto yātuṃ, gantuṃ pavisitunti attho. Taṃ pana antopavisanaṃ kenaci kāraṇena bahigatassa hotīti āha ^b^‘‘bahiddhā janapadacārikaṃ caritvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Niyyātu^eb^nti bahi nikkhamituṃ. Tañca bahinikkhamanaṃ bahiddhākaraṇīye sati sambhavatīti āha ^b^‘‘corā janapadaṃ vilumpantī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anusaññātu^eb^nti anusañcarituṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetū^eb^ti ettha ^b^adhi^eb^-saddo anatthakoti āha ^b^‘‘micchāpaṭipattiyā karaṇahetū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na ārādhako^eb^ti na sampādako na paripūrako. Ñāyati paṭivijjhanavasena nibbānaṃ gacchatīti ñāyo, so eva taṃsamaṅginaṃ vaṭṭadukkhapātato dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti ^b^ñāyo dhammo,^eb^ ariyamaggo. So panettha saha vipassanāya adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘sahavipassanakaṃ magga’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ārādhanaṃ^eb^ nāma saṃsiddhi, sā pana yasmā sampādanena paripūraṇena icchitā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sampādetuṃ pūretu’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^duggahitehī^eb^ti atthato byañjanato ca duṭṭhu gahitehi, ūnādhikaviparītapadapaccābhaṭṭhādivasena vilometvā gahitehīti attho. ^b^Uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitehī^eb^ti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ duggahassa ūnādhikādivasenapi sambhavato. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘attano duggahitasuttantānaṃyeva atthañca pāḷiñca uttaritaraṃ katvā dassentī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Samacittavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamassa ^a^V2.0036^ea^ paṭhame ^b^uddhaccena samannāgatā^eb^ti akappiye kappiyasaññitāya, kappiye akappiyasaññitāya, avajje vajjasaññitāya, vajje avajjasaññitāya ^a^M2.0040^ea^ uddhaccappakatikā. Ye hi vinaye apakataññuno saṃkilesavodāniyesu dhammesu na kusalā sakiñcanakārino vippaṭisārabahulā, tesaṃ anuppannañca uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, uppannañca bhiyyobhāvaṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati. Sārābhāvena tucchattā naḷo viyāti ^b^naḷo,^eb^ mānoti āha ^b^‘‘unnaḷāti uggatanaḷā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uṭṭhitatucchamānā’’^eb^ti. Māno hi seyyassa seyyoti sadisoti ca pavattiyā visesato tuccho. ^b^Cāpallenā^eb^ti capalabhāvena, taṇhāloluppenāti attho. ^b^Mukhakharā^eb^ti mukhena pharusā, pharusavādinoti attho.

[03]^b^Vikiṇṇavācā^eb^ti vissaṭavacanā samphappalāpitāya apariyantavacanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asaṃyatavacanā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vissaṭṭhasatino^eb^ti sativirahitā. Paccayavekallena vijjamānāyapi satiyā satikiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya evaṃ vuttā. Na sampajānantīti ^b^asampajānā,^eb^ taṃyoganivattiyaṃ cāyaṃ akāro ‘‘ahetukā dhammā (dha. sa. dukamātikā 2), abhikkhuko āvāso’’tiādīsu (cūḷava. 76) viyāti āha ^b^‘‘nippaññā’’^eb^ti, paññārahitāti attho. Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^vibbhantacittā^eb^ti ubbhantacittā. Samādhivirahena laddhokāsena uddhaccena tesaṃ samādhivirahānaṃ cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu paribbhamati vanamakkaṭo viya vanasākhāsu. ^b^Pākatindriyā^eb^ti saṃvarābhāvena gihikāle viya vivaṭaindriyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pakatiyā ṭhitehī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vivaṭehī^eb^ti asaṃvutehi.

[03]^b^44^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^bhaṇḍanaṃ vuccati kalahassa pubbabhāgo^eb^ti kalahassa hetubhūtā paribhāsā taṃsadisī ca aniṭṭhakiriyā bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma. ^b^Kalahajātā^eb^ti hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakappatto kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Viruddhavāda^eb^nti ‘‘ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo’’tiādinā viruddhavādabhūtaṃ vivādaṃ. Mukhasannissitatāya vācā idha ‘‘mukha’’nti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘dubbhāsitā vācā mukhasattiyoti vuccantī’’^eb^ti. Catubbidhampi saṅghakammaṃ sīmāparicchinnehi pakatattehi bhikkhūhi ekato kattabbattā ^b^ekakammaṃ^eb^ nāma. Pañcavidhopi pātimokkhuddeso ekato uddisitabbattā ^b^ekuddeso^eb^ nāma. Paññattaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato ^b^samasikkhatā^eb^ nāma ^a^M2.0041^ea^. Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^khīrodakībhūtā^eb^ti yathā khīrañca ^a^V2.0037^ea^ udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati, visuṃ na hoti, ekattaṃ viya upeti. Satipi hi ubhayesaṃ kalāpānaṃ paramatthato bhede pacurajanehi pana duviññeyyanānattaṃ khīrodakaṃ samoditaṃ accantameva saṃsaṭṭhaṃ viya hutvā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattūpagatacittuppādā viyāti khīrodakībhūtāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Mettācakkhūhī^eb^ti mettācittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā olokanacakkhūhi. Tāni hi piyabhāvadīpanato ‘‘piyacakkhūnī’’ti vuccanti.

[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^aggavatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^agga^eb^-saddo uttamapariyāyo, tena visiṭṭhassa puggalassa, visiṭṭhāya vā paṭipattiyā gahaṇaṃ idhādhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘aggavatīti uttamapuggalavatī’’^eb^tiādi. Avigatataṇhatāya taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahuṃ lanti ādiyantīti bahulā, bahulā eva ^b^bāhulikā^eb^ yathā ‘‘venayiko’’ti (a. ni. 8.11; pārā. 8; ma. ni. 1.246). Te pana yasmā paccayabahubhāvāya yuttappayuttā nāma honti, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘cīvarādibāhullāya paṭipannā’’^eb^ti. Sikkhāya ādaragāravābhāvato sithilaṃ adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti ^b^sāthalikā^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sithila^eb^nti ca bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, sithilasaddena vā samānatthassa sāthalasaddassa vasena sāthalikāti padasiddhi veditabbā. ^b^Avagamanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhogamanaṭṭhena, orambhāgiyabhāvenāti attho. ^b^Upadhiviveke^eb^ti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggatāya upadhivivitte. ^b^Oropitadhurā^eb^ti ujjhitussāhā. ^b^Duvidhampi vīriya^eb^nti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca vīriyaṃ.
