[03]^b^46^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^idaṃ dukkha^eb^nti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa paccakkhato aggahitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Ettakameva dukkha^eb^nti tassa paricchijja aggahitabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Ito uddhaṃ dukkhaṃ natthī^eb^ti anavasesetvā aggahitabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Yathāsabhāvato nappajānantī^eb^ti sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena asammohato nappaṭivijjhanti. Asammohapaṭivedho ca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte paccā dukkhassa rūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti, tathā pavatti. ^b^Accantakkhayo^eb^ti accantakkhayanimittaṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^Asamuppattī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma tadubhayampi nirujjhati, taṃ tesaṃ asamuppatti nibbānaṃ dukkhanirodhoti vuccati.

[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^M2.0042^ea^ visesanassa paranipātena ^b^‘‘parisākasaṭo’’^eb^ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘kasaṭaparisā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Kasaṭaparisā’’ti hi vattabbe ‘‘parisākasaṭo’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Parisāmaṇḍo^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sesamettha uttānameva.

[03]^b^48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0038^ea^^b^gambhīrā^eb^ti agādhā dukkhogāḷhā. ^b^Pāḷivasenā^eb^ti iminā yo dhammapaṭisambhidāya visayo gambhīrabhāvo, tamāha. Dhammappaṭivedhassa hi dukkarabhāvato dhammassa pāḷiyā dukkhogāḷhatāya gambhīrabhāvo. ^b^‘‘Pāḷivasena gambhīrā’’^eb^ti vatvā ^b^‘‘sallasuttasadisā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ tassa ‘‘animittamanaññāta’’ntiādinā (su. ni. 579) pāḷivasena gambhīratāya labbhanato. Tathā hi tattha tā gāthā duviññeyyarūpā tiṭṭhanti. Duviññeyyañhi ñāṇena dukkhogāḷhanti katvā ‘‘gambhīra’’nti vuccati. Pubbāparampettha kāsañci gāthānaṃ duviññeyyatāya dukkhogāḷhameva, tasmā taṃ ‘‘pāḷivasena gambhīrā’’ti vuttaṃ. Imināva nayena ^b^‘‘atthavasena gambhīrā’’^eb^ti etthāpi attho veditabbo. ^b^Mahāvedallasuttassa^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.449 ādayo) atthavasena gambhīratā suviññeyyāva. Lokaṃ uttaratīti lokuttaro, navavidho appamāṇadhammo. So atthabhūto etesaṃ atthīti ^b^lokuttarā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lokuttaraatthadīpakā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sattasuññaṃ dhammamattamevā^eb^ti sattena attanā suññaṃ kevalaṃ dhammamattameva. ^b^Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabba^eb^nti liṅgavacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe cā’’^eb^ti. Kavino kammaṃ kavitā. Yaṃ panassa kammaṃ, taṃ tena katanti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘kavitāti kavīhi katā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itara^eb^nti kāveyyāti padaṃ, kābyanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Kābya^eb^nti ca kavinā vuttanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vicitraakkharā^eb^ti vicittākārakkharā viññāpanīyā. ^b^Sāsanato bahibhūtā^eb^ti na sāsanāvacarā. ^b^Tesaṃ sāvakehī^eb^ti buddhānaṃ sāvakāti apaññātānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci sāvakehi. ^b^Na ceva aññamaññaṃ paṭipucchantī^eb^ti ye vācenti, ye ca suṇanti, te aññamaññaṃ atthādiṃ nappaṭipucchanti, kevalaṃ vācanasavanamatteneva parituṭṭhā honti. ^b^Cārikaṃ na vicarantī^eb^ti asukasmiṃ ṭhāne atthādiṃ jānantā atthīti pucchanatthāya cārikaṃ na gacchanti tādisassa puggalassa abhāvato tassa ca pubbāparavirodhato. ^b^Kathaṃ ropetabba^eb^nti kena pakārena nikkhipitabbaṃ. Attho nāma sabhāvato anusandhito sambandhato ^a^M2.0043^ea^ pubbāparato ādipariyosānato ca ñāto sammāñāto hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ko attho’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anuttānīkata^eb^nti akkharasannivesādinā anuttānīkataṃ. ^b^Kaṅkhāyā^eb^ti saṃsayassa.

[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame kilesehī āmasitabbato āmisaṃ, cattāro paccayā. Tadeva garu garukātabbaṃ etesaṃ, na dhammoti ^b^āmisagarū^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lokuttaradhammaṃ lāmakato gahetvā ṭhitaparisā’’^eb^ti. Ubhato bhāgato vimuttoti ^b^ubhatobhāgavimutto. Dvīhi bhāgehi^eb^ dve vāre vimutto. ^b^Paññāya vimutto^eb^ti samathasannissayena vinā aggamaggapaññāya vimutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavo’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0039^ea^. ^b^Kāyenā^eb^ti nāmakāyena. ^b^Jhānaphassaṃ phusitvā^eb^ti aṭṭhasamāpattisaññitaṃ jhānaphassaṃ adhigamavasena phusitvā. Pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ yathā ālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti ^b^kāyasakkhī^eb^. Na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā. ^b^Diṭṭhantaṃ patto^eb^ti diṭṭhassa anto anantaro kālo diṭṭhanto, dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti attho. Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippatto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ime dvepi chasu ṭhānesu labbhantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Saddahanto vimutto^eb^ti etena sabbathā avimuttassa saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvadassanena saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvameva vibhāveti. ^b^Saddhāvimutto^eb^ti vā saddhāya avimuttoti attho. ^b^Chasu ṭhānesū^eb^ti paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu. ^b^Dhammaṃ anussaratī^eb^ti paṭhamamaggapaññāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ anussarati. ^b^Saddhaṃ anussaratī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Ubhopi hete sotāpattimaggaṭṭhāyeva. ^b^Imaṃ kasmā gaṇhantī^eb^ti evaṃ ekantapāsaṃsesu ariyesu gayhamānesu imaṃ ekantaninditaṃ lāmakaṃ dussīlaṃ kasmā gaṇhanti. Sabbesu sabbatā sadisesu labbhamānopi viseso na paññāyati, visabhāge pana sati eva paññāyati paṭabhāvena viya cittapaṭassāti āha ^b^‘‘ekaccesu panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ganthitā^eb^ti avabaddhā. ^b^Mucchitā^eb^ti mucchaṃ sammohaṃ āpannā. ^b^Chandarāgaapakaḍḍhanāyā^eb^ti chandarāgassa apanayanatthaṃ. ^b^Nissaraṇapaññāyā^eb^ti tato nissaraṇāvahāya paññāya virahitā.

[03]^b^Paññādhurenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0044^ea^ vipassanābhinivesena. ^b^Abhiniviṭṭho^eb^ti vipassanāmaggaṃ otiṇṇo. ^b^Tasmiṃ khaṇe^eb^ti sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe. ^b^Dhammānusārī nāma^eb^ paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena ariyamaggasotassa anussaraṇato. ^b^Kāyasakkhī nāma^eb^ nāmakāyena sacchikātabbassa nibbānassa sacchikaraṇato. Vikkhambhanasamucchedānaṃ vasena ^b^dvikkhattuṃ^eb^. Arūpajjhānehi rūpakāyato, aggamaggena sesakāyatoti ^b^dvīhi bhāgehi^eb^ nissakkavacanañcetaṃ. Diṭṭhantaṃ patto, diṭṭhattā vā pattoti ^b^diṭṭhippatto^eb^. Tattha ^b^diṭṭhantaṃ patto^eb^ti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti attho. ^b^Diṭṭhattā^eb^ti catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya paññāya nirodhassa diṭṭhattā. Jhānaphassarahitāya sātisayāya paññāya eva vimuttoti ^b^paññāvimutto^eb^. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame na samāti ^b^visamā^eb^. Kāyakammādīnaṃ visamattā tato eva tattha pakkhalanaṃ sulabhanti āha ^b^‘‘sapakkhalanaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nippakkhalanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti pakkhalanābhāvena. ^b^Uddhammānī^eb^ti dhammato apetāni. ^b^Ubbinayānī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^a^V2.0040^ea^^b^adhammikā^eb^ti adhamme niyuttā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niddhammā’’^eb^ti, dhammarahitāti attho.

[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^gaṇhantī^eb^ti pavattenti. ^b^Na ceva aññamaññaṃ saññāpentī^eb^ti mūlato paṭṭhāya taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ yathā vūpasammati, evaṃ aññamaññaṃ itarītare na sammā jānāpenti. Saññāpanatthaṃ sannipāte sati tattha yuttapattakaraṇena saññattiyā bhavitabbaṃ, te pana saññāpanatthaṃ na sannipatanti. ^b^Na pekkhāpentī^eb^ti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya aññamaññaṃ na pekkhāpenti. Asaññattiyeva attanā gahitapakkhassa balaṃ etesanti ^b^asaññattibalā. Na tathā mantentī^eb^ti sandiṭṭhiparāmāsiādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggibhāvena tathā na mantenti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘thāmasā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Uttānatthoyeva^eb^ kaṇhapakkhe vuttappaṭipakkhena gahetabbattā.
[06]Parisavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyapaṇṇāsakassa ^a^M2.0045^ea^^a^V2.0041^ea^ paṭhame hitaggahaṇena mettā vuttā hoti, na karuṇā, anukampāgahaṇena pana karuṇāti ^b^cakkavattinā saddhiṃ gahitattā ‘‘lokānukampāyā’’ti na vuttaṃ^eb^. Nippariyāyato lokānukampā nāma sammāsambuddhādhīnāti. ^b^Dve^eb^ti manussadevasampattivasena dve sampattiyo. Tā dve, nibbānasampatti cāti ^b^tisso^eb^.
[03]^b^54^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye bahuso loke na ciṇṇā na pavattā manussāti ^b^āciṇṇamanussā^eb^. Kadācideva hi nesaṃ loke nibbatti abhūtapubbā bhūtāti ^b^abbhutamanussā^eb^.
[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu anutāpaṃ karoti^eb^ tassa ekabuddhakhettabhāvato.
[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^thūpassa yuttā^eb^ti dhātuyo pakkhipitvā thūpakaraṇassa yuttā.
[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^attano ānubhāvenā^eb^ti sayambhuñāṇena. ^b^Buddhā^eb^ti buddhavanto.

[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^pahīnattā na bhāyatī^eb^ti attasinehābhāvato na bhāyati. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ, attasinehassa paṭighassa tadekaṭṭhasammohassa ca vasena bhāyanaṃ hotīti tesampi pahīnattā na bhāyati, aññathā sotāpannādīnaṃ abhayena bhavitabbaṃ siyā. ^b^Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavattā^eb^ti ettha ahaṃkārasammohanatādīnampi balavattāti vattabbaṃ.
[03]^b^59^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^assājānīyo^eb^ti likhanti, ^b^usabhājānīyo^eb^ti pana pāṭhoti.

[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^tatthā^eb^ti antarāpaṇe. ^b^Eko^eb^ti dvīsu kinnaresu eko. Ambilikāphalañca addasāti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Ambilikāphala^eb^nti tintiṇīphalanti ^a^M2.0046^ea^ vadanti, caturambilanti apare. ^b^Dve atthe^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ vutte dve atthe.

[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^V2.0042^ea^ yathāāraddhe kicce vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanaṃ paṭivānaṃ, natthi etassa paṭivānanti ^b^appaṭivāno^eb^. Tattha asaṃkocappatto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anukkaṇṭhito’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^63^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame ^b^sannivāsa^eb^nti sahavāsaṃ. Yathā asappurisā saha vasantā aññamaññaṃ agāravena anādariyaṃ karonti, tappaṭikkhepena sappurisānaṃ sagāravappaṭipattidassanaparamidaṃ suttaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvādasame ^b^dvīsupi pakkhesū^eb^ti vivādāpannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dvīsupi pakkhesu. ^b^Saṃsaramānā^eb^ti pavattamānā. ^b^Diṭṭhipaḷāso^eb^ti diṭṭhisannissayo paḷāso yugaggāho. ^b^Āghātento^eb^ti āhananto bādhento. ^b^Anabhirādhanavasenā^eb^ti yassa uppajjati, tassa tadaññesañca atthassa anabhirādhanavasena. ^b^Sabbampeta^eb^nti vacīsaṃsāroti sabbampetaṃ. Attano citte parisāya ca citteti ānetvā sambandho.
[06]Puggalavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^65^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyassa paṭhame ^b^sabbakāmanipphattimūlakaṃ sukha^eb^nti anavasesaupabhogaparibhogavatthunipphattihetukaṃ kāmasukhaṃ. ^b^Pabbajjāmūlakaṃ sukha^eb^nti pabbajjāhetukaṃ pavivekasukhaṃ.

[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^kāme^eb^ti pañca kāmaguṇe, sabbepi vā tebhūmake dhamme. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā’’ti (mahāni. 1). ^b^Nekkhammaṃ vuccati pabbajjā^eb^ gharabandhanato nikkhantattā. Nibbānameva vā –
[21]‘‘Pabbajjā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, nibbānañca vipassanā;
[22]Sabbepi kusalā dhammā, nekkhammanti pavuccare’’ti. (itivu. aṭṭha. 109) –
[07]Hi vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^M2.0047^ea^^a^V2.0043^ea^ upadhī vuccanti pañcupādānakkhandhā, tannissitaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^upadhisukhaṃ^eb^. Tappaṭipakkhato ^b^nirupadhisukhaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe vaṭṭapariyāpannaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^vaṭṭasukhaṃ^eb^. Nibbānārammaṇaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^vivaṭṭasukhaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^saṃkilesa^eb^nti saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vaṭṭagāmisukha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vivaṭṭasukha^eb^nti maggaphalasahagataṃ sukhaṃ.

[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ariyānameva sukhaṃ ^b^ariyasukhaṃ,^eb^ ariyañca taṃ sukhañcātipi ^b^ariyasukhaṃ^eb^. Anariyānameva sukhaṃ ^b^anariyasukhaṃ^eb^. Anariyañca taṃ sukhañcātipi ^b^anariyasukhaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^ta^eb^nti cetasikasukhaṃ.

[03]^b^72^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame saha pītiyā vattatīti ^b^sappītikaṃ,^eb^ pītisahagataṃ sukhaṃ. Sabhāvato virāgato ca natthi etassa pītīti ^b^nippītikaṃ sukhaṃ^eb^. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panettha jhānasukhameva uddhaṭaṃ, tathā ca ‘‘lokiyasappītikasukhato lokiyanippītikasukhaṃ agga’’nti vuttaṃ. Lokiyanippītikampi hi aggaṃ labbhatevāti bhūmantaraṃ bhinditvā aggabhāvo veditabbo.

[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame sātasabhāvameva sukhaṃ ^b^sātasukhaṃ,^eb^ na upekkhāsukhaṃ viya asātasabhāvaṃ. Kāmañcettha kāyaviññāṇasahagatampi sātasukhameva, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘tīsu jhānesu sukha’’nteva vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^74^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame samādhisampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^samādhisukhaṃ^eb^. Na samādhisampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^asamādhisukhaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^75^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame suttantakathā esāti ^b^‘‘sappītikaṃ jhānadvaya’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^77^eb^^b^.^eb^ Terasame rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ uttarapadalopena, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^rūpārammaṇaṃ^eb^. Catutthajjhānaggahaṇaṃ pana yadassa paṭiyogī, tena samānayogakkhamadassanaparaṃ. ^b^Yaṃ kiñci rūpa^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ. Tappaṭikkhepena ^b^arūpaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ.
[06]Sukhavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^78-79^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyassa ^a^M2.0048^ea^^a^V2.0044^ea^ paṭhame nimīyati ettha phalaṃ avasesapaccayehi pakkhipīyati viyāti ^b^nimittaṃ,^eb^ kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘sanimittāti sakāraṇā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dutiyādīsū^eb^ti dutiyasuttādīsu. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā nidānādipadānampi kāraṇapariyāyameva dīpeti. Nidadāti phalanti ^b^nidānaṃ,^eb^ hinoti phalaṃ patiṭṭhāti etenāti ^b^hetu,^eb^ saṅkharoti phalanti ^b^saṅkhāro,^eb^ paṭicca etasmā phalaṃ etīti ^b^paccayo,^eb^ ruppati niruppati phalaṃ etthāti ^b^rūpa^eb^nti evaṃ nidānādipadānampi hetupariyāyatā veditabbā.
[03]^b^84^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^paccayabhūtāyā^eb^ti sahajātādipaccayabhūtāya.

[03]^b^87^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katoti saṅkhato, saṅkhato dhammo ārammaṇaṃ etesanti ^b^saṅkhatārammaṇā. Maggakkhaṇe na honti nāma^eb^ pahīyantīti katvā. ^b^Nāhesu^eb^nti ettha ‘‘vuccantī’’ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ. ^b^Yāva arahattā desanā desitā^eb^ taṃtaṃsuttapariyosāne ‘‘na hontī’’ti vuttattā.
[06]Sanimittavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^88^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthassa paṭhame ^b^phalasamādhī^eb^ti catūsupi ariyaphalesu samādhi. Tathā ^b^phalapaññā^eb^ veditabbā.
[03]^b^89^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye sampayuttadhamme pariggaṇhātīti ^b^paggāho^eb^. Na vikkhipatīti ^b^avikkhepo^eb^.

[03]^b^90^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye namanaṭṭhena ^b^nāmaṃ^eb^. Ruppanaṭṭhena ^b^rūpaṃ^eb^. Sammasanacārassa adhippetattā ^b^‘‘cattāro arūpakkhandhā’’^eb^tveva vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhamma-koṭṭhāsaparicchedañāṇaṃ nāma kathita’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^91^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^a^V2.0045^ea^ vijānanaṭṭhena ^b^vijjā^eb^. Vimuccanaṭṭhena ^b^vimutti^eb^.

[03]^b^92^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^M2.0049^ea^ bhavo nāma sassataṃ sadā bhāvato, sassatavasena uppajjanadiṭṭhi ^b^bhavadiṭṭhi^eb^. Vibhavo nāma ucchedo vināsanaṭṭhena, vibhavavasena uppajjanadiṭṭhi ^b^vibhavadiṭṭhi. Uttānatthāneva^eb^ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.

[03]^b^95^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vippaṭikūlagāhimhi vipaccanīkasāte anādare puggaleti dubbaco, tassa kammaṃ dovacassaṃ, tassa dubbacassa puggalassa anādariyavasena pavattā cetanā. Tassa bhāvo ^b^dovacassatā. Tassa bhāvo^eb^ti ca tassa yathāvuttassa dovacassassa atthibhāvo, atthato dovacassameva. Vitthārato panesā ‘‘tattha katamā dovacassatā? Sahadhammike vuccamāne dovacassāya’’nti ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ āgatā. Sā atthato saṅkhārakkhandho hoti. Catunnaṃ vā khandhānaṃ etenākārena pavattānaṃ etaṃ adhivacananti vadanti.

[03]Pāpayogato pāpā assaddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti pāpamitto, tassa bhāvo ^b^pāpamittatā^eb^. Vitthārato panesā ‘‘tattha katamā pāpamittatā? Ye te puggalā assaddhā dussīlā appassutā maccharino duppaññā. Yā tesaṃ sevanā nisevanā saṃsevanā bhajanā sambhajanā bhatti sambhatti taṃsampavaṅkatā’’ti (dha. sa. 1333) evaṃ āgatā. Sāpi atthato dovacassatā viya daṭṭhabbā. Yāya hi cetanāya puggalo pāpasampavaṅko nāma hoti, sā cetanā cattāropi vā arūpino khandhā tadākārappavattā ^b^pāpamittatā^eb^.

[03]^b^96^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ padakkhiṇagāhimhi anulomasāte sādare puggaleti ^b^subbaco^eb^tiādinā, kalyāṇā saddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti ^b^kalyāṇamitto^eb^tiādinā vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^97^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame pathavīdhātuādayo sukhadhātukāmadhātuādayo ca etāsveva antogadhāti etāsu kosalle dassite tāsupi kosallaṃ dassitameva hotīti ^b^‘‘aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhātūti jānana^eb^nti iminā aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ sabhāvaparicchedikā savanadhāraṇasammasanappaṭivedhapaññā vuttā. Tattha dhātūnaṃ savanadhāraṇapaññā sutamayā, itarā bhāvanāmayā. Tatthāpi sammasanapaññā lokiyā ^a^M2.0050^ea^. Vipassanā hi sā, itarā lokuttarā. Lakkhaṇādivasena aniccādivasena ca manasikaraṇaṃ manasikāro, tattha kosallaṃ ^b^manasikārakusalatā^eb^. Aṭṭhārasannaṃyeva ^a^V2.0046^ea^ dhātūnaṃ sammasanappaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇapaññā manasikārakusalatā, sā ādimajjhapariyosānavasena tidhā bhinnā. Tathā hi sammasanapaññā tassā ādi, paṭivedhapaññā majjhe, paccavekkhaṇapaññā pariyosānaṃ.

[03]^b^98^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame āpattiyova āpattikkhandhā. Tā pana antarāpattīnaṃ aggahaṇena pañca, tāsaṃ gahaṇena satta hontīti āha ^b^‘‘pañcannañca sattannañca āpattikkhandhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Jānana^eb^nti ‘‘imā āpattiyo, ettakā āpattiyo, evañca tāsaṃ āpajjanaṃ hotī’’ti jānanaṃ. Evaṃ tippakārena jānanapaññā hi āpattikusalatā nāma. Āpattito vuṭṭhāpanappayogatāya kammabhūtā vācā kammavācā, tathābhūtā anussāvanavācā. ‘‘Imāya kammavācāya ito āpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, hontañca paṭhame, tatiye vā anussāvane yya-kāraṃ patte, ‘saṃvarissāmī’ti vā pade pariyosite hotī’’ti evaṃ taṃ taṃ āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaparicchedajānanapaññā ^b^āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā. Vuṭṭhāna^eb^nti ca yathāpannāya āpattiyā yathā tathā anantarāyatāpādanaṃ. Evaṃ vuṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva desanāyapi saṅgaho siddho hoti.
[06]Dhammavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^99^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamassa paṭhame ^b^anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahatī^eb^ti attano asampattaṃ bhāraṃ vahati. Atherova samāno therehi vahitabbaṃ bījanaggāhadhammajjhesanādibhāraṃ vahatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (mahāva. aṭṭha. 159-160) pana yasmā sammajjanādinavavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ āṇatteneva kātabbaṃ, pātimokkhañca āṇatteneva uddisitabbaṃ, tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ vinā āṇattiyā karonto anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati nāmāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sammajjanī padīpo’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yañhi ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitu’’ntiādinā nayena ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ āgataṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu ca –
[21]‘‘Sammajjanī ^a^M2.0051^ea^^a^V2.0047^ea^ padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca;
[22]Uposathassa etāni, ‘pubbakaraṇa’nti vuccati.
[21]‘‘Chandapārisuddhiutukkhānaṃ, bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo;
[22]Uposathassa etāni, ‘pubbakicca’nti vuccatī’’ti. (mahāva. aṭṭha 168) –

[07]Evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tasmā ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, therena bhikkhunā navaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetu’’nti vacanato therena āṇattena agilānena bhikkhunā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitabbaṃ, pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetabbaṃ, āsanaṃ paññāpetabbaṃ, padīpo kātabbo, akaronto dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.

[03]Therenapi patirūpaṃ ñatvā āṇāpetabbaṃ, āṇāpentenapi yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karonto vā sadā kālameva eko vā bhāranittharaṇako vā sarabhāṇakadhammakathikādīsu vā aññataro na uposathāgārasammajjanatthaṃ āṇāpetabbo, avasesā pana vārena āṇāpetabbā. Sace āṇatto sammajjaniṃ tāvakālikampi na labhati, sākhābhaṅgaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā sammajjitabbaṃ, tampi alabhantassa laddhakappiyaṃ hoti. Padīpakaraṇepi vuttanayeneva āṇāpetabbo, āṇāpentena ca ‘‘amukasmiṃ nāma okāse telaṃ vā kapallikā vā atthi, taṃ gahetvā karohī’’ti vattabbo. Sace telādīni natthi, pariyesitabbāni. Pariyesitvā alabhantassa laddhakappiyaṃ hoti. Api ca kapāle aggi jāletabbo. Āsanapaññāpanāṇattiyampi vuttanayeneva āṇāpetabbo, āṇattena ca sace uposathāgāre āsanāni natthi, saṅghikāvāsato āharitvā paññāpetvā puna āharitabbāni, āsanesu asati kaṭasārakepi taṭṭikāyopi paññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, tāsupi asati sākhābhaṅgāni kappiyaṃ kāretvā paññāpetabbāni. Kappiyakārakaṃ alabhantassa laddhakappiyaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Chandapārisuddhī^eb^ti ettha uposathakaraṇatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe bahi uposathaṃ katvā āgatena sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kāyasāmaggiṃ adentena chando dātabbo. Yopi gilāno vā kiccappasuto vā, tena pārisuddhiṃ dentena chando dātabbo. Kathaṃ dātabbo? Ekassa bhikkhuno ^a^M2.0052^ea^ santike ‘‘chandaṃ dammi, chandaṃ me hara, chandaṃ me ārocehī’’ti ayamattho kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo. Evaṃ dinno hoti chando. Akatūposathena pana gilānena vā kiccappasutena vā pārisuddhi ^a^V2.0048^ea^ dātabbā. Kathaṃ dātabbā? Ekassa bhikkhuno santike ‘‘pārisuddhiṃ dammi, pārisuddhiṃ me hara, pārisuddhiṃ me ārocehī’’ti ayamattho kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo. Evaṃ dinnā hoti pārisuddhi. Taṃ pana dentena chandopi dātabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe pārisuddhiṃ dentena chandampi dātuṃ, santi saṅghassa karaṇīya’’nti. Tattha pārisuddhidānaṃ saṅghassapi attanopi uposathakaraṇaṃ sampādeti, na avasesaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ. Chandadānaṃ saṅghasseva uposathakaraṇañca sesakiccañca sampādeti, attano pana uposatho akatoyeva hoti, tasmā pārisuddhiṃ dentena chandopi dātabbo.

[03]^b^Utukkhāna^eb^nti ‘‘hemantādīnaṃ utūnaṃ ettakaṃ atikkantaṃ, ettakaṃ avasiṭṭha’’nti evaṃ utūnaṃ ācikkhanaṃ. ^b^Bhikkhugaṇanā^eb^ti ‘‘ettakā bhikkhū uposathagge sannipatitā’’ti bhikkhūnaṃ gaṇanā. Idampi ubhayaṃ katvāva uposatho kātabbo. ^b^Ovādo^eb^ti bhikkhunovādo. Na hi bhikkhūnīhi yācitaṃ ovādaṃ anārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhuniyo hi ‘‘sve uposatho’’ti āgantvā ‘‘ayaṃ uposatho cātuddaso, pannaraso’’ti pucchitvā puna uposathadivase āgantvā ‘‘bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya, bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu kira, ayya, bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana’’nti evaṃ ovādaṃ yācanti. Taṃ ṭhapetvā bālagilānagamiye añño sacepi āraññako hoti, appaṭiggahetuṃ na labhati, tasmā yena so paṭiggahito, tena bhikkhunā uposathagge pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu evaṃ vattabbo ‘‘bhikkhunisaṅgho, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa pāde vandati, ovādūpasaṅkamanañca yācati, labhatu kira, bhante, bhikkhunisaṅgho ovādūpasaṅkamana’’nti.

[03]Pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbaṃ – ‘‘atthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato’’ti. Sace hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, tato tena so vattabbo – ‘‘itthannāmako bhikkhu ^a^M2.0053^ea^ bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho upasaṅkamatū’’ti. Sace natthi, tato tena pucchitabbaṃ – ‘‘ko āyasmā ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu’’nti. Sace koci ussahati, sopi ca aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato, taṃ tattheva sammannitvā ovādappaṭiggāhako vattabbo – ‘‘itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, taṃ bhikkhunisaṅgho upasaṅkamatū’’ti. Sace pana na koci ussahati, pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbaṃ – ‘‘natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato, pāsādikena bhikkhunisaṅgho sampādetū’’ti. Ettāvatā hi sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ ārocitaṃ hoti. Tena bhikkhunā ‘‘sādhū’’ti sampaṭicchitvā pāṭipade bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Pātimokkhampi ‘‘na, bhikkhave, anajjhiṭṭhena pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbaṃ, yo uddiseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti vacanato anāṇattena na uddisitabbaṃ. ‘‘Therādheyyaṃ pātimokkha’’nti hi vacanato saṅghatthero vā pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya ^a^V2.0049^ea^, ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yo tattha bhikkhu byatto paṭibalo, tassādheyyaṃ pātimokkha’’nti vacanato navakataro vā therena āṇatto. Dutiyādīni uttānatthāneva.

[03]^b^109^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame ^b^na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyatī^eb^ti na kukkuccāyituṃ yuttakaṃ kukkuccāyati. Sūkaramaṃsaṃ labhitvā ‘‘acchamaṃsa’’nti kukkuccāyati, ‘‘sūkaramaṃsa’’nti jānantopi ‘‘acchamaṃsa’’nti kukkuccāyati, na paribhuñjatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ migamaṃsaṃ ‘‘dīpimaṃsa’’nti, kāle santeyeva ‘‘kālo natthī’’ti, appavāretvā ‘‘pavāritomhī’’ti, patte rajasmiṃ apatiteyeva ‘‘patita’’nti, attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse akateyeva ‘‘maṃ uddissa kata’’nti kukkuccāyati. ^b^Kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyatī^eb^ti kukkuccāyituṃ yuttaṃ na kukkuccāyati. Acchamaṃsaṃ labhitvā ‘‘sūkaramaṃsa’’nti na kukkuccāyati, ‘‘acchamaṃsa’’nti jānantopi ‘‘sūkaramaṃsa’’nti na kukkuccāyati, madditvā vītikkamatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ dīpimaṃsaṃ migamaṃsanti…pe… attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse kate ‘‘maṃ uddissa kata’’nti na kukkuccāyatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘na kukkuccāyitabbanti saṅghabhogassa apaṭṭhapanaṃ avicāraṇaṃ na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ nāma, taṃ kukkuccāyati. Kukkuccāyitabbanti tasseva paṭṭhapanaṃ vicāraṇaṃ, taṃ na kukkuccāyatī’’ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Tattha ^a^M2.0054^ea^^b^saṅghabhogassā^eb^ti saṅghassa catupaccayaparibhogatthāya dinnakhettavatthutaḷākādikassa, tato uppannadhaññahiraññādikassa ca saṅghassa bhogassa. ^b^Apaṭṭhapana^eb^nti asaṃvidahanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avicāraṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tassevā^eb^ti yathāvuttasseva saṅghabhogassa.
[06]Bālavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^119^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyapaṇṇāsakassa ^a^V2.0050^ea^^a^M2.0055^ea^ paṭhame dukkhena pajahitabbāti ^b^duppajahā. Duccajā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Dvinnaṃ āsānaṃ duccajabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti paṭhamaṃ tāva lābhāsāya duccajabhāvaṃ vibhāveti ^b^‘‘lābhāsāyā’’^eb^tiādinā. ^b^Ubhatobyūḷha^eb^nti yuddhatthāya ubhato sannipatitaṃ. ^b^Pakkhandantī^eb^ti anuppavisanti. ^b^Jīvitāsāya duppajahattā^eb^tiādinā jīvitāsāya duccajabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.

[03]^b^120^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^dullabhā^eb^ti na sulabhā. ^b^Iṇaṃ demīti saññaṃ karotī^eb^ti evaṃ saññaṃ karonto viya hotīti attho. Ettha ca ‘‘pubbakārīti paṭhamaṃ upakārassa kārako. Kataññū katavedīti tena kataṃ ñatvā pacchā kārako. Tesu pubbakārī ‘iṇaṃ demī’ti saññaṃ karoti, pacchā kārako ‘iṇaṃ jīrāpemī’ti saññaṃ karotī’’ti ettakameva idha vuttaṃ. Puggalapaṇṇattisaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ (pu. pa. aṭṭha. 83) pana –

[08]‘‘Pubbakārīti paṭhamameva kārako. Katavedīti kataṃ vedeti, viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. Te agāriyānagāriyehi dīpetabbā. Agārikesu hi mātāpitaro pubbakārino nāma, puttadhītaro pana mātāpitaro paṭijaggantā abhivādanādīni tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma. Anagāriyesu ācariyupajjhāyā pubbakārino nāma, antevāsikasaddhivihārikā ācariyupajjhāye paṭijaggantā abhivādanādīni ca tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma. Tesaṃ āvibhāvatthāya upajjhāyaposakasoṇattherādīnaṃ vatthūni kathetabbāni.

[08]‘‘Aparo nayo – parena akateyeva upakāre attani kataṃ upakāraṃ anapekkhitvā kārako pubbakārī, seyyathāpi mātāpitaro ceva ācariyupajjhāyā ca. So dullabho sattānaṃ taṇhābhibhūtattā. Parena katassa upakārassa anurūpappavattiṃ ^a^M2.0056^ea^ attani ^a^V2.0051^ea^ kataṃ upakāraṃ upakārato jānanto vediyanto kataññukatavedī seyyathāpi mātāpituācariyupajjhāyesu sammāpaṭipanno. Sopi dullabho sattānaṃ avijjābhibhūtattā. Apica akāraṇavacchalo pubbakārī, sakāraṇavacchalo kataññukatavedī. ‘Karissati me’ti evamādikāraṇanirapekkhakiriyo pubbakārī, ‘karissati me’ti evamādikāraṇasāpekkhakiriyo kataññukatavedī. Tamojotiparāyaṇo pubbakārī, jotijotiparāyaṇo kataññukatavedī. Desetā pubbakārī, paṭipajjitā kataññukatavedī. Sadevake loke arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pubbakārī, ariyasāvako kataññukatavedī’’ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Tattha kāraṇena vinā pavattahitacitto ^b^akāraṇavacchalo^eb^. Anāgatamhi payojanaṃ apekkhamāno ‘‘karissati me’’tiādinā cittena paṭhamaṃ gahitaṃ tādisaṃ kataṃ upādāya kataññū eva nāma hoti, na pubbakārīti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘karissati meti evamādikāraṇasāpekkhakiriyo kataññukatavedī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tamojotiparāyaṇo^eb^ puññaphalāni anupajīvanto eva puññāni karotīti ^b^‘‘pubbakārī’’^eb^ti vutto. Puññaphalaṃ upajīvanto hi kataññupakkhe tiṭṭhati.

[03]^b^121^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^titto^eb^ti suhito pariyosito niṭṭhitakiccatāya nirussukko. Guṇapāripūriyā hi paripuṇṇo yāvadattho idha titto vutto. ^b^Tappetā^eb^ti aññesampi tittikaro. ^b^Paccekabuddho ca tathāgatasāvako ca khīṇāsavo titto^eb^ti ettha paccekabuddho navalokuttaradhammehi sayaṃ titto paripuṇṇo, aññaṃ pana tappetuṃ na sakkoti. Tassa hi dhammakathāya abhisamayo na hoti, sāvakānaṃ pana dhammakathāya aparimāṇānaṃ devamanussānaṃ abhisamayo hoti. Evaṃ santepi yasmā te dhammaṃ desentā na attano vacanaṃ katvā kathenti, buddhānaṃ vacanaṃ katvā kathenti, sotuṃ nisinnaparisāpi – ‘‘ayaṃ bhikkhu na attanā paṭividdhaṃ dhammaṃ kathetī’’ti cittīkāraṃ karoti. Iti so cittīkāro buddhānaṃyeva hoti. Evaṃ tattha sammāsambuddhova tappetā nāma. Yathā hi ‘‘asukassa nāma idañcidañca dethā’’ti raññā āṇatte ^a^M2.0057^ea^ kiñcāpi ānetvā denti, atha kho rājāva tattha dāyako. Yehipi laddhaṃ hoti, te ‘‘raññā amhākaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ dinnaṃ, issariyavibhavo dinno’’tveva gaṇhanti, na ‘‘rājapurisehī’’ti evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^122^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^duttappayā^eb^ti atappayā, na sakkā kenaci tappetuṃ. Yo hi upaṭṭhākakulaṃ vā ñātikulaṃ vā nissāya vasamāno cīvare jiṇṇe tehi dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipati, na paribhuñjati ^a^V2.0052^ea^. Punappunaṃ dinnampi gahetvā nikkhipateva. Yo ca teneva nayena laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vissajjeti, parassa deti, punappunaṃ laddhampi tatheva karoti. Ime dve puggalā sakaṭehipi paccaye upanentena tappetuṃ na sakkāti duttappayā.

[03]^b^123^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^na vissajjetī^eb^ti attano akatvā parassa na deti, atireke pana sati na nikkhipati, parassa deti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sabbaṃyeva paresaṃ na detī’’^eb^tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ‘‘yo bhikkhu upaṭṭhākakulā vā ñātikulā vā jiṇṇacīvaro sāṭakaṃ labhitvā cīvaraṃ katvā paribhuñjati na nikkhipati, aggaḷaṃ datvā pārupantopi punapi diyyamāne sahasā nappaṭiggaṇhāti. Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ attanā paribhuñjati, paresaṃ na deti. Ime dvepi sukhena sakkā tappetunti sutappayā’’ti.
[03]^b^124-127^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhasattamādīni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Āsāduppajahavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^131^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saddho bhikkhū^eb^ti saddhāya samannāgato bhikkhu. Yo bhikkhu sāriputtamoggallānehi sadisabhāvaṃ pattheti, so yehi guṇehi sāriputtamoggallānā etadagge ṭhapitā, te guṇe attano abhikaṅkheyyāti āha ^b^‘‘yādiso sāriputtatthero paññāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ito uttari patthento micchā pattheyyā^eb^ti sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ ye paññādayo guṇā upalabbhanti, tato uttari patthento micchā pattheyya. Aggasāvakaguṇaparamā hi sāvakaguṇamariyādā. Tesaṃ sāvakaguṇānaṃ ^a^M2.0058^ea^ yadidaṃ aggasāvakaguṇā, na tato paraṃ sāvakaguṇā nāma atthi. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ natthi, tassa patthitattā’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.

[03]^b^135^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame yassa guṇā khatā upahatā ca, so ^b^khato upahato^eb^ nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘guṇānaṃ khatattā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Khatattā^eb^ti chinnattā. ^b^Upahatattā^eb^ti naṭṭhattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘chinnaguṇaṃ naṭṭhaguṇanti^eb^^a^V2.0053^ea^^b^attho’’^eb^ti. Apuññassa pasavo nāma atthato paṭilābhoti āha ^b^‘‘pasavatīti paṭilabhatī’’^eb^ti, attano santāne uppādetīti attho. ^b^Ananupavisitvā^eb^ti ñāṇena anogāhetvā. Sesamettha chaṭṭhādīni ca suviññeyyāneva.
[06]Āyācanavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^142^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyassa paṭhame dīyatīti ^b^dānaṃ,^eb^ deyyadhammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Dīyati anenāti vā ^b^dānaṃ,^eb^ pariccāgacetanāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ayaṃ duvidhopi attho idhādhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘diyyanakavasena dānānī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^diyyanakavasenā^eb^ti dātabbavasena. ^b^Amatapattipaṭipada^eb^nti amatappattihetubhūtaṃ sammāpaṭipadaṃ.
[03]^b^143-151^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyādīni ca suviññeyyāneva.
[06]Dānavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^152^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthassa paṭhame āmisassa ca dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa ca antare sambhavantassa chiddassa vivarassa bhedassa santharaṇaṃ pidahanaṃ saṅgaṇhanaṃ santhāro. Ayañhi lokasannivāso alabbhamānena āmisena dhammena cāti dvīhi chiddo. Tassa taṃ chiddaṃ yathā na paññāyati ^a^M2.0059^ea^, evaṃ pīṭhassa viya paccattharaṇena āmisena dhammena ca santharaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhanaṃ santhāroti vuccati. Ettha ca āmisena saṅgaho ^b^āmisasanthāro^eb^ nāma. Taṃ karontena mātāpitūnaṃ bhikkhugatikassa ^a^V2.0054^ea^ veyyāvaccakarassa rañño corānañca aggaṃ aggahetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Āmasitvā dinnehi rājāno ca corā ca anatthampi karonti, jīvitakkhayampi pāpenti. Anāmasitvā dinnena attamanā honti, coranāgavatthuādīni cettha vatthūni kathetabbāni. Tāni samantapāsādikāya ^b^vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (pārā. 185) vitthāritāni. Sakkaccaṃ uddesadānaṃ pāḷivaṇṇanā dhammakathākathananti evaṃ dhammena saṅgaho ^b^dhammasanthāro^eb^ nāma.
[03]^b^153-163^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyādīni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Santhāravaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^164^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamassa paṭhame ‘‘ito pubbe parikammaṃ pavattaṃ, ito paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ majjhe samāpattī’’ti evaṃ saha parikammena appanāparicchedappajānanā paññā ^b^samāpattikusalatā^eb^. Vuṭṭhāne kusalabhāvo ^b^vuṭṭhānakusalatā^eb^. Pageva vuṭṭhānaparicchedakañāṇanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^165^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ujuno bhāvo ^b^ajjavaṃ,^eb^ ajimhatā akuṭilatā avaṅkatāti attho. ^b^Abhidhammepi^eb^ (dha. sa. 1346) vuttaṃ – ‘‘tattha katamo ajjavo? Yā ajjavatā ajimhatā akuṭilatā avaṅkatā, ayaṃ vuccati ajjavo’’ti. ^b^Anajjavañca^eb^ ajjavappaṭikkhepena veditabbaṃ. Gomuttavaṅkatā, candalekhāvaṅkatā, naṅgalakoṭivaṅkatāti hi tayo anajjavā. Ekacco hi bhikkhu paṭhamavaye majjhima-pacchimavaye ca ekavīsatiyā anesanāsu chasu ca agocaresu carati, ayaṃ gomuttavaṅkatā nāma, ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā paṭipattiyā vaṅkabhāvato. Eko paṭhamavaye pacchimavaye ca catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pūreti, lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti, majjhimavaye purimasadiso, ayaṃ candalekhāvaṅkatā nāma, paṭipattiyā majjhaṭṭhāne ^a^M2.0060^ea^ vaṅkabhāvāpattito. Eko paṭhamavayepi majjhimavayepi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pūreti, lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti, pacchimavaye purimasadiso, ayaṃ naṅgalakoṭivaṅkatā nāma, pariyosāne vaṅkabhāvāpattito. Eko sabbampetaṃ vaṅkataṃ pahāya tīsu vayesu ^a^V2.0055^ea^ pesalo lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti, tassa yo so ujubhāvo, idaṃ ajjavaṃ nāma, sabbattha ujubhāvasiddhito.

[03]^b^Maddava^eb^nti ettha ‘‘lajjava’’ntipi paṭhanti. Evaṃ panettha attho – ‘‘tattha katamo lajjavo? Yo hirīyati hirīyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā, ayaṃ vuccati lajjavo’’ti evaṃ vutto lajjibhāvo lajjavaṃ nāma. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ – lajjatīti lajjo, hirimā, tassa bhāvo ^b^lajjavaṃ,^eb^ hirīti attho. Lajjā etassa atthīti lajjī yathā ‘‘mālī māyī’’ti, tassa bhāvo lajjibhāvo, sā eva lajjā.

[03]^b^166^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^adhivāsanakhantī^eb^ti ettha adhivāsanaṃ vuccati khamanaṃ. Tañhi paresaṃ dukkaṭaṃ duruttañca paṭivirodhākaraṇena attano upari āropetvā vāsanato ‘‘adhivāsana’’nti vuccati. Adhivāsanalakkhaṇā khanti adhivāsanakhanti. Sucisīlatā ^b^soraccaṃ^eb^. Sā hi sobhanakammaratatā. Suṭṭhu vā pāpato oratabhāvo viratatāti āha ^b^‘‘suratabhāvo’’^eb^ti. Teneva ^b^abhidhammepi^eb^ (dha. sa. 1349) –
[08]‘‘Tattha katamaṃ soraccaṃ? Yo kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo, idaṃ vuccati soraccaṃ, sabbopi sīlasaṃvaro soracca’’nti – āgato.

[03]^b^167^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe sakhilo vuccati saṇhavāco, tassa bhāvo ^b^sākhalyaṃ,^eb^ saṇhavācatā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṇhavācāvasena sammodamānabhāvo’’^eb^ti. Saṇhavācāvasena hi sammodamānassa puggalassa bhāvo nāma saṇhavācatā. Teneva ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ (dha. sa. 1350) –

[08]‘‘Tattha katamaṃ sākhalyaṃ? Yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā parakaṭukā parābhisajjanī kodhasāmantā asamādhisaṃvattanikā, tathārūpiṃ ^a^M2.0061^ea^ vācaṃ pahāya yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā, tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti, yā tattha saṇhavācatā sakhilavācatā apharusavācatā, idaṃ vuccati sākhalya’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Tattha ^b^aṇḍakā^eb^ti sadose savaṇe rukkhe niyyāsapiṇḍo, ahicchattādīni vā uṭṭhitāni aṇḍakānīti ^a^V2.0056^ea^ vadanti, pheggurukkhassa pana kuthitassa aṇḍāni viya uṭṭhitā cuṇṇapiṇḍiyo vā gaṇṭhiyo vā aṇḍakā. Idha pana byāpajjanakakkasādisabhāvato kaṇṭakappaṭibhāgena vācā aṇḍakāti vuttā. Padumanāḷaṃ viya sotaṃ ghaṃsayamānā pavisantī ^b^kakkasā^eb^ daṭṭhabbā. Kodhena nibbattā tassa parivārabhūtā ^b^kodhasāmantā^eb^. Pure saṃvaddhanārī ^b^porī^eb^. Sā viya sukumārā mudukā vācā porī viyāti porī. ^b^Saṇhavācatā^eb^tiādinā taṃ vācaṃ pavattamānaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^168^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^‘‘avihiṃsāti karuṇāpubbabhāgo’’^eb^ti ettakameva idha vuttaṃ, dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ^b^saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.304) pana ‘‘avihiṃsāti karuṇāpi karuṇāpubbabhāgopī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhidhammepi^eb^ (vibha. 182) ‘‘tattha katamā avihiṃsā? Yā sattesu karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti, ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsā’’ti āgataṃ. Etthāpi hi yā kāci karuṇā ‘‘karuṇā’’ti vuttā, karuṇācetovimutti pana appanāppattāva.

[03]Sucisaddato bhāve yakāraṃ ikārassa ca ukārādesaṃ katvā ayaṃ niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘socabyaṃ sucibhāvo’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca ^b^socabya^eb^nti sīlavasena sucibhāvoti vuttaṃ. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ^b^saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.304) pana ‘‘soceyyanti mettāya ca mettāpubbabhāgassa ca vasena sucibhāvo’’ti vuttaṃ. Teneva ^b^abhidhammepi^eb^ ‘‘tattha katamaṃ socabyaṃ? Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti, idaṃ vuccati socabya’’nti niddeso kato. Etthāpi hi ‘‘mettī’’tiādinā yā kāci mettā vuttā, mettācetovimutti pana appanāppattāva.
[03]^b^169-171^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhasattamaaṭṭhamāni ^a^M2.0062^ea^ heṭṭhā vuttanayāneva.
[03]^b^172^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi balaṭṭho eva, paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīyataṃ sātisayaṃ balaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘muṭṭhassacce akampanenā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^173^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame paccanīkadhammasamanato ^b^samatho,^eb^ samādhīti āha ^b^‘‘samathoti cittekaggatā’’^eb^ti. Aniccādinā vividhenākārena dassanato passanato ^b^vipassanā,^eb^ paññāti āha ^b^‘‘saṅkhārapariggāhakañāṇa’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^174^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame ^a^V2.0057^ea^^b^dussīlya^eb^nti samādinnassa sīlassa bhedakaro vītikkamo. ^b^Diṭṭhivipattī^eb^ti ‘‘atthi dinna’’ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā dūsikā micchādiṭṭhīti āha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhivipattīti micchādiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^175^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvādasame ^b^sīlasampadā^eb^ti sabbabhāgato tassa anūnatāpatti paripuṇṇabhāvo sīlasampadā. Paripūraṇattho hettha sampadāsaddo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇasīlatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Diṭṭhisampadā^eb^ti atthikadiṭṭhiādisammādiṭṭhipāripūribhāvena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Tañca kammassakatāsammādiṭṭhiādivasena pañcavidhaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘tena kammassakatā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^176^eb^^b^.^eb^ Terasame ^b^sīlavisuddhī^eb^ti visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthaṃ sīlaṃ, cittavisuddhiādiuparivisuddhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ visuddhasīlanti vuttaṃ hoti. Suvisuddhameva hi sīlaṃ tassā padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sīlavisuddhīhi visuddhisampāpakaṃ sīla’’^eb^nti. Etthāpi ^b^visuddhisampāpaka^eb^nti cittavisuddhiādiuparivisuddhiyā sampāpakanti attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Abhidhamme^eb^ (dha. sa. 1372) panāyaṃ ‘‘tattha katamā sīlavisuddhi? Kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo, ayaṃ vuccati sīlavisuddhī’’ti evaṃ vibhattā.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhivisuddhī^eb^ti visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthaṃ dassanañāṇaṃ dassanavisuddhi, paramatthavisuddhiṃ nibbānañca pāpetuṃ upanetuṃ samatthaṃ kammassakatañāṇādi sammādassananti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘visuddhisampāpikā…pe… pañcavidhāpi vā sammādiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti. Etthāpi ^b^visuddhisampāpikā^eb^ti ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā dassananibbānasaṅkhātāya ^a^M2.0063^ea^ paramatthavisuddhiyā ca sampāpikāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Abhidhamme^eb^ (dha. sa. 1373) panāyaṃ ‘‘tattha katamā diṭṭhivisuddhi? Kammassakatañāṇaṃ, saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, maggassa maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ, phalasamaṅgissa ñāṇa’’nti evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]Ettha ca idaṃ akusalakammaṃ no sakaṃ, idaṃ pana kammaṃ sakanti evaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca kammassakatajānanañāṇaṃ ^b^kammassakatañāṇaṃ^eb^. Tividhaduccaritañhi attanā katampi parena katampi no sakakammaṃ nāma hoti atthabhañjanato, sucaritaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma atthajananato. Vipassanāñāṇaṃ pana vacīsaccañca anulometi, paramatthasaccañca na vilometīti ^b^saccānulomikañāṇa^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Vipassanāñāṇañhi lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhanatthaṃ ārambhakāle ^a^V2.0058^ea^ ‘‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’’ti pavattaṃ vacīsaccañca anulometi, tatheva paṭivijjhanato paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānañca na vilometi na virādheti ekanteneva sampāpanato.

[03]^b^177^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cuddasame ^b^diṭṭhivisuddhī^eb^ti paṭhamamaggasammādiṭṭhi vuttā. ^b^Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhāna^eb^nti taṃsampayuttameva vīriyaṃ. Teneva ^b^dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.304) ‘‘diṭṭhivisuddhīti ñāṇadassanaṃ kathitaṃ. Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti taṃsampayuttameva vīriya’’nti vuttaṃ. Ettha hi ^b^ñāṇadassana^eb^nti ñāṇabhūtaṃ dassanaṃ. Tena dassanamaggaṃ vadati. ^b^Taṃsampayuttameva vīriya^eb^nti paṭhamamaggasampayuttavīriyamāha. Apica ^b^diṭṭhivisuddhī^eb^ti sabbāpi maggasammādiṭṭhi. ^b^Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhāna^eb^nti taṃsampayuttameva vīriyaṃ. Teneva ^b^dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘apica purimapadena catumaggañāṇaṃ, pacchimapadena taṃsampayuttaṃ vīriya’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Atha vā ^b^diṭṭhīvisuddhī^eb^ti kammassakatañāṇādisaṅkhātā sabbāpi sammādiṭṭhi vuttā. ^b^Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhāna^eb^nti yo cetasiko vīriyārambho…pe… sammāvāyāmoti. Ayameva pāḷiyā sameti. Abhidhamme hi ‘‘diṭṭhivisuddhi kho panāti yā paññā pajānanā…pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi. Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti yo cetasiko vīriyārambho…pe… sammāvāyāmo’’ti evamayaṃ duko vibhatto. Teneva ^b^abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1374) ‘‘yā paññā pajānanātiādīhi heṭṭhā vuttāni kammassakatañāṇādīneva cattāri ñāṇāni vibhattāni. ‘Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho’tiādīhi ^a^M2.0064^ea^ padehi niddiṭṭhaṃ vīriyaṃ gahitaṃ paññāya lokiyaṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ, lokuttaraṭṭhāne lokuttara’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Idhāpi visuddhisampāpikā catumaggasammādiṭṭhi, pañcavidhāpi vā sammādiṭṭhi diṭṭhivisuddhīti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘diṭṭhivisuddhīti visuddhisampāpikā sammādiṭṭhiyevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttaṃ vīriya^eb^nti idaṃ pana ‘‘yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti paṭhamamaggasampayuttaṃ vīriyanti vutta’’nti adhippāyena vadati. Ettha ca taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ matabhedenāyaṃ vaṇṇanābhedoti na aṭṭhakathāvacanānaṃ aññamaññavirodho saṅkitabbo. Atha yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttameva vīriyaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘tañhi tassā diṭṭhiyā anurūpattā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^tassā diṭṭhiyā^eb^ti heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttāya diṭṭhiyā. ^b^Yathādiṭṭhissā^eb^ti anurūpadiṭṭhissa kalyāṇadiṭṭhissa nibbattitappakāradiṭṭhissa vā nibbattetabbapadhānānurūpadiṭṭhissa yathādiṭṭhippavattakiriyassa vāti evampettha atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇayanti.

[03]^b^178^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pannarasame ^a^V2.0059^ea^ samattaṃ tussanaṃ titti santuṭṭhi, natthi etassa santuṭṭhīti asantuṭṭhi, asantuṭṭhissa bhāvo ^b^asantuṭṭhitā^eb^. Yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asantuṭṭhassa bhiyyokamyatā, tassā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tāya hi samaṅgibhūto puggalo sīlaṃ pūretvā jhānaṃ uppādeti, jhānaṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhati, āraddhavipassako arahattaṃ aggahetvā antarā vosānaṃ nāpajjati, ‘‘alamettāvatā katamettāvatā’’ti saṅkocaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aññatra arahattamaggā kusalesu dhammesu asantuṭṭhibhāvo’’^eb^ti. Tatra ^b^aññatra arahattamaggā^eb^ti arahattamaggasampattaṃ vināti attho. ‘‘Appaṭivānitā ca padhānasmi’’nti idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti na vibhattaṃ.

[03]^b^179^eb^^b^.^eb^ Soḷasame muṭṭhā naṭṭhā sati etassāti muṭṭhassati, tassa bhāvo ^b^muṭṭhassacca^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘muṭṭhassaccanti muṭṭhassatibhāvo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Muṭṭhassatibhāvo^eb^ti ca satippaṭipakkho dhammo, na satiyā abhāvamattaṃ. ^b^Asampajañña^eb^nti ‘‘tattha katamaṃ asampajaññaṃ? Yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ…pe… avijjālaṅghī moho akusalamūla’’nti (dha. sa. 1357) evaṃ vuttā avijjāyeva. Tathā hi vijjāpaṭipakkho avijjā vijjāya pahātabbato, evaṃ sampajaññappaṭipakkho asampajaññaṃ ^a^M2.0065^ea^. Yasmā pana sampajaññappaṭipakkhe sati tassa vasena ñāṇassa abhāvo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aññāṇabhāvo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^180^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattarasame ^b^apilāpanalakkhaṇā satī^eb^ti udake lābu viya yena cittaṃ ārammaṇe pilavitvā viya tiṭṭhati, na ogāhati, taṃ pilāpanaṃ. Na pilāpanaṃ apilāpanaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvo etissāti apilāpanalakkhaṇā.
[06]Samāpattivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Tatiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^181^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ito paresu kodhavaggādīsu ^b^upanandhanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti kujjhanavasena ‘‘akkocchi maṃ avadhi ^a^V2.0060^ea^ ma’’ntiādinā (dha. pa. 3, 4) cittapariyonandhanalakkhaṇo. Pubbakālikaṃ kodhaṃ upanayhati bandhati, kujjhanākāraṃ pabandhati ghaṭeti. Āghātavatthunā cittaṃ bandhantī viya hotīti aparakālo kodho upanāho. Suṭṭhu kataṃ kāraṇaṃ upakāro sukatakāraṇaṃ, tassa pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa makkhanaṃ udakapuñchaniyā viya sarīrānugatassa udakassa puñchanaṃ vināsanaṃ lakkhaṇametassāti ^b^sukatakaraṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo^eb^. Tathā hi so paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanaṭṭhena makkhoti vuccati. Bahussutepi puggale ajjhotthariṃsu, ‘‘īdisassa ca bahussutassa aniyatā gahitā, tava ca mama ca ko viseso’’tiādinā nayena uppajjamāno yugaggāhī palāsoti āha ^b^‘‘yugaggāhalakkhaṇo palāso’’^eb^ti. Tattha yugaggāho nāma samadhuraggāho, asamampi attanā samaṃ katvā gaṇhanaṃ. Palāsatīti ^b^palāso,^eb^ paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā dantehi viya chinditvā attano guṇehi same karotīti attho.

[03]^b^Usūyanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti paresaṃ sakkārādīni khiyyanalakkhaṇā. Maccherassa bhāvo ^b^macchariyaṃ^eb^. Tañca āvāsamacchariyādivasena pañcavidhanti āha ^b^‘‘pañcamaccherabhāvo macchariya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Maccharāyanalakkhaṇa^eb^nti attano sampattiyā ^a^M2.0066^ea^ parehi sādhāraṇabhāve asahanalakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^Katappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti katapāpappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā. Kerāṭikabhāvena uppajjamānaṃ sāṭheyyanti āha ^b^‘‘kerāṭikalakkhaṇaṃ sāṭheyya’’^eb^nti. Aññathā attano pavedanapuggalo kerāṭiko nekatikavāṇijoti vadanti. Kerāṭiko hi puggalo ānandamaccho viya hoti.
[03]^b^187^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye^eb^ti yathā ābhataṃ kañci āharitvā ṭhapito, evaṃ attano kammunā nikkhitto niraye ṭhapitoyevāti attho.

[03]^b^191-200^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dukkhassa vaḍḍhi etesanti ^b^dukkhavaḍḍhikā^eb^. Ye hi dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhenti, punappunaṃ uppādenti, dukkhassa vaḍḍhi tesaṃ atthīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sukhavaḍḍhikā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^201^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atthavase^eb^ti ^a^V2.0061^ea^ vuddhivisese ānisaṃsavisese. Tesaṃ pana sikkhāpadapaññattikāraṇattā āha ^b^‘‘dve kāraṇāni sandhāyā’’^eb^ti. Atthoyeva vā ^b^atthavaso,^eb^ dve atthe dve kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti ^b^atthavaso,^eb^ kāraṇanti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yathā ‘‘anabhijjhā dhammapada’’nti vutte anabhijjhā eko dhammakoṭṭhāsoti attho hoti. Evamidhāpi ^b^sikkhāpada^eb^nti sikkhākoṭṭhāso sikkhāya eko padesoti ayamettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha ^b^‘‘sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sikkhākoṭṭhāso ṭhapito’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Saṅghasuṭṭhu^eb^ nāma saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvo ‘‘suṭṭhu devā’’ti (pārā. aṭṭha. 39) āgataṭṭhāne viya ‘‘suṭṭhu, bhante’’ti vacanasampaṭicchanabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅghasuṭṭhutāyāti saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā^eb^ti dummaṅkū nāma dussīlapuggalā. Ye maṅkutaṃ āpādiyamānāpi dukkhena āpajjanti, vītikkamaṃ karontā vā katvā vā ^a^M2.0067^ea^ na lajjanti, tesaṃ niggahatthāya. Te hi sikkhāpade asati ‘‘kiṃ tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ sutaṃ, kiṃ amhehi kataṃ, katarasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ katamaṃ āpattiṃ ropetvā amhe niggaṇhathā’’ti saṅghaṃ viheṭhessanti, sikkhāpade pana sati tesaṃ saṅgho sikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggahessati. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā’’ti.

[03]^b^Pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyā^eb^ti pesalānaṃ piyasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya. Piyasīlā hi bhikkhū kattabbākattabbaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādaṃ ajānantā sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā kilamanti, ubbāḷhā honti, kattabbākattabbaṃ pana sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādañca ñatvā sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭentā na kilamanti, na ubbāḷhā honti. Tena tesaṃ sikkhāpadappaññāpanā phāsuvihārāya saṃvattati. Yo vā dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggaho, sveva etesaṃ phāsuvihāro. Dussīlapuggale nissāya hi uposatho na tiṭṭhati, pavāraṇā na tiṭṭhati, saṅghakammāni nappavattanti, sāmaggī na hoti, bhikkhū anekaggā uddesaparipucchākammaṭṭhānādīni anuyuñjituṃ na sakkonti. Dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti, tato pesalā bhikkhū phāsu viharanti. Evaṃ ‘‘pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyā’’ti ettha dvidhā attho veditabbo.
[03]‘‘Na ^a^V2.0062^ea^ vo ahaṃ, cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.182) ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
[21]‘‘Yena devūpapatyassa, gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo;
[27]Yakkhattaṃ yena gaccheyyaṃ, manussattañca abbaje;
[22]Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā’’ti. (a. ni. 4.36) –

[07]Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhanādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti āha – ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vītikkamapaccayā paṭiladdhabbāna’’^eb^ntiādi. Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na paññāpeyya, tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā, ye ca tannimittameva ^a^M2.0068^ea^ nirayādīsu nibbattassa paññavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavanappakārā anatthā, te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā’’^eb^ti. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha bhavā ^b^diṭṭhadhammikā^eb^. Samparetabbato pecca gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko, tattha bhavā ^b^samparāyikā^eb^.

[03]^b^Akusalaverāna^eb^nti pāṇātipātādipañcaduccaritānaṃ. Tāni verakāraṇattā ‘‘verānī’’ti vuccanti, puggalesu pana uppajjamānāni verāni. ^b^Te eva vā dukkhadhammā^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttā vadhabandhanādayo. ^b^Tesaṃ pakkhupacchedanatthāyā^eb^ti tesaṃ pāpicchānaṃ pakkhupacchedāya gaṇabhojanasadisaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ. ^b^Paṇḍitamanussāna^eb^nti lokiyaparikkhakajanānaṃ. Te hi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ñatvā vā yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū disvā vā – ‘‘yāni vata loke mahājanassa rajjanadussanamuyhanaṭṭhānāni, tehi ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā ārakā viharanti, dukkaraṃ vata karonti, bhāriyaṃ vata karontī’’ti pasādaṃ āpajjanti vinayapiṭake potthakaṃ disvā micchādiṭṭhikatavedibrāhmaṇo viya. ^b^Uparūparipasādabhāvāyā^eb^ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasāduppādanatthaṃ. Yepi hi sāsane pasannā kulaputtā, tepi sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ vā ñatvā yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū vā disvā ‘‘aho, ayyā, dukkarakārino, ye yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vinayasaṃvaraṃ anupālentī’’ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdanti.

[03]^b^Saddhammassa^eb^^a^V2.0063^ea^^b^ciraṭṭhitattha^eb^nti pariyattisaddhammo, paṭipattisaddhammo, adhigamasaddhammoti tividhassapi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ. Tattha piṭakattayasaṅgahitaṃ sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ ^b^pariyattisaddhammo^eb^ nāma. Terasa dhutaguṇā, cuddasa khandhakavattāni, dveasīti mahāvattāni, sīlasamādhivipassanāti ayaṃ ^b^paṭipattisaddhammo^eb^ nāma. Cattāro ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañcāti ayaṃ ^b^adhigamasaddhammo^eb^ nāma. So sabbo yasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati bhikkhū sikkhāpadañca tassa vibhaṅgañca tadatthajotanatthaṃ aññañca buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, yathāpaññattañca paṭipajjamānā paṭipattiṃ pūretvā paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigacchanti, tasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā ciraṭṭhitiko hoti.

[03]^b^Pañcavidhassapi^eb^^a^M2.0069^ea^^b^vinayassā^eb^ti tadaṅgavinayādivasena pañcappakārassa vinayassa. ^b^Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (pārā. aṭṭha. 39) pana sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati saṃvaravinayo ca pahānavinayo ca samathavinayo ca paññattivinayo cāti catubbidhopi vinayo anuggahito hoti upatthambhito supatthambhito. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vinayānuggahāyā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^saṃvaravinayo^eb^ti sīlasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidhopi saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, vinayanato vinayoti vuccati. ^b^Pahānavinayo^eb^ti tadaṅgappahānaṃ, vikkhambhanappahānaṃ, samucchedappahānaṃ, paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ, nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhampi pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ, vinayanaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā pahānavinayoti vuccati. ^b^Samathavinayo^eb^ti satta adhikaraṇasamathā. ^b^Paññattivinayo^eb^ti sikkhāpadameva. Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato sikkhāpadasaṅkhāto paññattivinayoti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā anuggahito hoti.

[03]^b^202-230^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhikkhūnaṃ pañcā^eb^ti nidānapārājikasaṅghādisesāniyatavitthāruddesavasena pañca bhikkhūnaṃ uddesā. ^b^Bhikkhunīnaṃ cattāro^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ vuttesu aniyatuddesaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā cattāro.

[03]^b^Ehibhikkhūpasampadā^eb^ti ‘‘ehi bhikkhū’’ti vacanamattena paññattaupasampadā. Bhagavā hi ehibhikkhubhāvāya upanissayasampannaṃ puggalaṃ disvā rattapaṃsukūlantarato suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dakkhiṇahatthaṃ nīharitvā brahmaghosaṃ nicchārento ‘‘ehi bhikkhu, cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’’ti vadati. Tassa saheva bhagavato vacanena gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyati, pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ruhati, bhaṇḍu kāsāvavasano hoti – ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃse ṭhapetvā vāmaaṃsakūṭe āsattanīluppalavaṇṇamattikāpatto.
[21]‘‘Ticīvarañca ^a^V2.0064^ea^ patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;

[22]Parissāvanena aṭṭhete, yuttayogassa bhikkhuno’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.215; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.294; 2.349; a. ni. aṭṭha. 2.4.198; pārā. aṭṭha. 45 padabhājanīyavaṇṇanā; apa. aṭṭha. 1.avidūrenidānakathā; bu. vaṃ. aṭṭha. 27.avidūrenidānakathā; jā. aṭṭha. 1.avidūrenidānakathā; mahāni. aṭṭha. 206) –
[07]Evaṃ ^a^M2.0070^ea^ vuttehi aṭṭhahi parikkhārehi sarīre paṭimukkehiyeva vassasatikatthero viya iriyāpathasampanno buddhācariyako buddhupajjhāyako sammāsambuddhaṃ vandamānoyeva tiṭṭhati.

[03]^b^Saraṇagamanūpasampadā^eb^ti ‘‘buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī’’tiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ bhinditvā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi anuññātaupasampadā. ^b^Ovādūpasampadā^eb^ti ovādappaṭiggahaṇaupasampadā. Sā ca ‘‘tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘tibbaṃ me hirottappaṃ, paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesū’ti. Evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ suṇissāmi kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karitvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇissāmī’ti, evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabbaṃ. Tasmātiha te, kassapa, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsati na vijahissatī’ti, evañhi te, kassapa, sikkhitabba’’nti (saṃ. ni. 2.154) iminā ovādappaṭiggahaṇena mahākassapattherassa anuññātaupasampadā.

[03]^b^Pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā^eb^ nāma sopākassa anuññātaupasampadā. Bhagavā kira pubbārāme anucaṅkamantaṃ sopākasāmaṇeraṃ ‘‘uddhumātakasaññāti vā, sopāka, rūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā, udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna’’nti dasa asubhanissite pañhe pucchi. So byākāsi. Bhagavā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā ‘‘kativassosi, tvaṃ sopākā’’ti pucchi. Sattavassohaṃ bhagavāti. Sopāka, tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā pañhe byākāsīti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujāni. Ayaṃ pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā.

[03]^b^Ñatticatutthaupasampadā^eb^ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ etarahi upasampadā. ^b^Garudhammūpasampadā^eb^ti garudhammappaṭiggahaṇena upasampadā. Sā ca mahāpajāpatiyā aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇena anuññātā ^a^V2.0065^ea^. ^b^Ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā^eb^ nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghato ñatticatutthena, bhikkhusaṅghato ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi anuññātā aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā. ^b^Dūtena upasampadā^eb^ nāma aḍḍhakāsiyā gaṇikāya anuññātā upasampadā.

[03]^b^Ñattikammaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0071^ea^^b^nava ṭhānāni gacchatī^eb^ti katamāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ, nissāraṇaṃ, uposatho, pavāraṇā, sammuti, dānaṃ, paṭiggahaṃ, paccukkaḍḍhanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamanti evaṃ vuttāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati. Tattha ‘‘suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, anusiṭṭho so mayā, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo āgaccheyya, āgacchāhīti vattabbo’’ti (mahāva. 126) evaṃ upasampadāpekkhassa osāraṇā ^b^osāraṇā^eb^ nāma.

[03]‘‘Suṇantu me, āyasmantā, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dhammakathiko, imassa neva suttaṃ āgacchati, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati. Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā’’ti evaṃ ubbāhikavinicchaye dhammakathikassa bhikkhuno nissāraṇā ^b^nissāraṇā^eb^ nāma.
[03]‘‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajjuposatho pannaraso. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā’’ti evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti ^b^uposatho^eb^ nāma.
[03]‘‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajja pavāraṇā pannarasī. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho pavāreyyā’’ti evaṃ pavāraṇākammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti ^b^pavāraṇā^eb^ nāma.

[03]‘‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ anusāseyya’’nti, ‘‘yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyā’’ti, ‘‘yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ antarāyike dhamme puccheyya’’nti, ‘‘yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ antarāyike dhamme puccheyyā’’ti, ‘‘yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyya’’nti, ‘‘yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyā’’ti, ‘‘yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho ^a^V2.0066^ea^ vissajjeyya’’nti, ‘‘yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho ^a^M2.0072^ea^ vissajjeyyā’’ti evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā sammannituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti ^b^sammuti^eb^ nāma.

[03]‘‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā’’ti, ‘‘yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyu’’nti evaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvarapattādīnaṃ dānaṃ ^b^dānaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03]‘‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya’’nti, ‘‘yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpatiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya’’nti, tena vattabbo ‘‘passasī’’ti? Āma passāmīti. ‘‘Āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī’’ti evaṃ āpattippaṭiggaho ^b^paṭiggaho^eb^ nāma.

[03]‘‘Suṇantu me, āyasmantā āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame kāle pavāreyyāmā’’ti, te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā taṃ kālaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ, āvāsikena bhikkhunā byattena paṭibalena āvāsikā bhikkhū ñāpetabbā ‘‘suṇantu me, āyasmantā āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā’’ti evaṃ katā pavāraṇā ^b^paccukkaḍḍhanā^eb^ nāma.

[03]Sabbeheva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitabbaṃ, sannipatitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo ‘‘suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, amhākaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ viharataṃ bahu assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ. Sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvatteyya. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyya ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ, ṭhapetvā gihipaṭisaṃyutta’’nti evaṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathe katā sabbapaṭhamā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti ^b^kammalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03]^b^Ñattidutiyaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0073^ea^^b^kammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatī^eb^ti katamāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0067^ea^, nissāraṇaṃ, sammuti, dānaṃ, uddharaṇaṃ, desanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamanti evaṃ vuttāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati. Tattha vaḍḍhassa licchavino pattanikkujjanavasena khandhake vuttā ^b^nissāraṇā,^eb^ tasseva pataukkujjanavasena vuttā ^b^osāraṇā^eb^ ca veditabbā. Sīmāsammuti ticīvarena avippavāsasammuti santhatasammuti bhattuddesakasenāsanaggāhāpakabhaṇḍāgārika- cīvarappaṭiggāhaka-cīvarabhājaka-yāgubhājaka-phalabhājaka-khajjabhājaka-appamattakavissajjaka- sāṭiyaggāhāpaka-pattaggāhāpaka-ārāmikapesaka-sāmaṇerapesakasammutīti etāsaṃ sammutīnaṃ vasena ^b^sammuti^eb^ veditabbā. Kaṭhinacīvaradānamatakacīvaradānavasena ^b^dānaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. Kaṭhinuddhāraṇavasena ^b^uddhāro^eb^ veditabbo. Kuṭivatthuvihāravatthudesanāvasena ^b^desanā^eb^ veditabbā. Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañattiñca ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekaṃ ñattiñcāti tissopi ñattiyo ṭhapetvā puna ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekā, ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekāti dvepi ñattidutiyakammavācā vuttā. Tāsaṃ vasena ^b^kammalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ñatticatutthakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatī^eb^ti katamāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ, nissāraṇaṃ, sammuti, dānaṃ, niggahaṃ, samanubhāsanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamanti evaṃ vuttāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati. Tattha tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ vasena ^b^nissāraṇā,^eb^ tesaṃyeva ca kammānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena ^b^osāraṇā^eb^ veditabbā. Bhikkhunovādakasammutivasena ^b^sammuti^eb^ veditabbā. Parivāsadānamānattadānavasena ^b^dānaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. Mūlāyapaṭikassanakammavasena ^b^niggaho^eb^ veditabbo. Ukkhittānuvattakā, aṭṭha yāvatatiyakā, ariṭṭho, caṇḍakāḷī ca imete yāvatatiyakāti imāsaṃ ekādasannaṃ samanubhāsanānaṃ vasena ^b^samanubhāsanā^eb^ veditabbā. Upasampadakammaabbhānakammavasena ^b^kammalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Dhammasammukhatā^eb^tiādīsu yena dhammena, yena vinayena, yena satthusāsanena saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, ayaṃ ^b^dhammasammukhatā, vinayasammukhatā, satthusāsanasammukhatā^eb^. Tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti bhūtavatthu. ^b^Vinayo^eb^ti codanā ceva sāraṇā ca. ^b^Satthusāsanaṃ^eb^ nāma ñattisampadā ceva anusāvanasampadā ca. Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ ^a^M2.0074^ea^ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā nappaṭikkosanti, ayaṃ ^b^saṅghasammukhatā^eb^. Yassa saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, tassa sammukhībhāvo ^b^puggalasammukhatā^eb^. Sesamettha vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
